result.description: Schedule ATF suites to be executed at specific dates/times, against the server and/or specified browsers. Schedules can run client-based suites against browsers opened to the Scheduled Client Test Runner module. Notify users with email reports upon completion of a scheduled suite
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.schedule"
		name="Automated Test Framework - Schedule"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		type="feature_set"
		trackable="true"
		namespace="sn_atf"
		help="CSHelp:ATF-Scheduled-Test-Suites">
	<description>Schedule ATF suites to be executed at specific dates/times, against the server and/or specified browsers. Schedules can run client-based suites against browsers opened to the Scheduled Client Test Runner module. Notify users with email reports upon completion of a scheduled suite</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.automated_testing_framework" />
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFSchedule" class="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.schedule.api.ATFSchedule"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScheduledRunsExecutor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.schedule.api.ScheduledRunsExecutor"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Automated Test Framework - Schedule

result.description: Helps manage user groups and roles to protect information through role-based access controls. Efficiently consolidates duplicate entries for inherited roles.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.role_management.inh_count"
   name="Contextual Security: Role Management V2"
   version="1.0.0"
   state="published"
   help="Contextual_Security_InhCount_Plugin"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   afterload="fix_sys_user_has_role.js">
   <description>Helps manage user groups and roles to protect information through role-based access controls. Efficiently consolidates duplicate entries for inherited roles.</description>
	<requires>
	    <import plugin="com.glide.role_management"/>
	    <import plugin="com.glide.identity.security"/>
	</requires>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="UserHasRoleAccessHandler" class="com.glide.role_management.UserHasRoleAccessHandler" order="60"/>
 </plugin>
result.name: Contextual Security: Role Management V2

		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>Enables the chat widget to be selectively installed per service portal</description>

</plugin>

result.description:
The multiple provider single sign-on plugin enables organizations to authenticate against multiple IDPs (Identity providers) using SAML or OpenID connect(OIDC).
It also supports authentication using multiple digest configurations.
result.definition:

<plugin id="com.snc.integration.sso.multi.installer"
	name="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On Installer"
	type="integration"
	help="Multiple_Provider_Single_Sign-On"
	version="2.0.0" 
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	state="published">
	<description>
		The multiple provider single sign-on plugin enables organizations to authenticate against multiple IDPs (Identity providers) using SAML or OpenID connect(OIDC).
It also supports authentication using multiple digest configurations.
	</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.adaptive_authentication"/>
	</requires>

</plugin>

result.description: This plugin provides Predictive Intelligence Solutions for Enterprise Architecture. It helps in prediction by applying algorithms like similarity on business applications related data.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.apm.predictive_intelligence"
   name="Enterprise Architecture - Predictive Intelligence"
   state="published"
   help="Application_Portfolio_Management_Predictive_intelligence"
   type="application"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   licensable="true"
   trackable="true"
   license_model="none"
   scope_name="sn_apm_ml"
   scope_sys_id="63fd587981101010f87760d154e34ab0">

result.description: This plugin adds external content search capabilities to knowledge management. Once configured, this feature will create a copy of the external content on ServiceNow as knowledge articles, and then indexing the articles through Zing Search. Please ensure that you have appropriate reuse and copy privileges before you configure an external source to be searchable using this feature.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.knowledge.external_integration"
   name="Knowledge Management - External Content Integration"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   help="CSHelp:Knowledge-External-Content-Search"
   type="feature_set"
   trackable="true"
   licensable="false"
   scope_name="sn_km_intg"
   scope_sys_id="dbdce2f53b1003007538870044efc4be">
   <description>This plugin adds external content search capabilities to knowledge management. Once configured, this feature will create a copy of the external content on ServiceNow as knowledge articles, and then indexing the articles through Zing Search. Please ensure that you have appropriate reuse and copy privileges before you configure an external source to be searchable using this feature.</description>

	<requires>
      <import plugin="com.snc.knowledge_advanced.installer"/>
      <import plugin="com.snc.core.automation.connection_credential"/>
      <import plugin="com.snc.knowledge.external_integration.api"/>
	</requires>
 </plugin>

result.description: Legacy implementation of OAuth 2.0. Please instead install com.snc.platform.security.oauth.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.legacy" name="OAuth 2.0 legacy (do not activate...use 'OAuth 2.0' instead)" version="1.0.0" state="published" 
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>Legacy implementation of OAuth 2.0. Please instead install com.snc.platform.security.oauth. </description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthCryptoGenerator"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.certificate.generator.OAuthCryptoGenerator"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthEntityBuilder"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.scriptable.OAuthEntityBuilder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.login_redirect" name="OAuthLoginRedirect"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.login.OAuthLoginRedirect"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthAPI"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.OAuthAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.sys.user" name="GlideOAuthClient"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.GlideOAuthClient"/>
 </plugin>
result.name: OAuth 2.0 legacy (do not activate...use 'OAuth 2.0' instead)

result.description: Activity stream is a history of events that happened for a record
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
		id="com.glide.activity"
		name="Activity Stream"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>Activity stream is a history of events that happened for a record</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.db.rotation"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng"  name="list_history" class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.NGListHistoryProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="StreamEntryService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.StreamEntryService"/>

	<!-- scriptable objects -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideActivity"    class="com.glide.activity.core.plugins.Activity"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideActivityFix" class="com.glide.activity.core.plugins.ActivityFix"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NGListHistoryRenderUtil" class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.NGListHistoryRenderUtil" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideActivityValidator"  class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.validation.ActivityValidator"/>

	<!-- engine -->
	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="ActivityScriptEngine"     class="com.glide.activity.core.plugins.ActivityScriptEngine" />
	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="ActivityEngine" table="*" class="com.glide.activity.core.plugins.ActivityEmailAmbEngine" />

	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="ActivityDBListener" class="com.glide.activity.core.plugins.ActivityDBListener" />

	<!-- activity rules -->
	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule.factory" name="Extension Point Rule Factory" class="com.glide.activity.core.rules.ExtensionPointRuleFactory"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule" name="sys_audit"    	 class="com.glide.activity.rules.SysAuditRule"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule" name="journal"    	 class="com.glide.activity.rules.SysJournalFieldRule"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule" name="attachment" 	 class="com.glide.activity.rules.SysAttachmentRule"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule" name="email"      	 class="com.glide.activity.rules.SysEmailRule"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.activity.rule" name="audit_relation" class="com.glide.activity.rules.SysAuditRelationRule"/>

	<!-- Activity GraphQL -->
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="GraphQL Activity Data Source" class="com.glide.activity.graphql.schema.ActivitySchema" />
</plugin>
result.name: Activity Stream

result.description: Provides the ability to move a subset of data from large tables into archive tables. Typical candidates include historical ITIL documents such as incidents which were closed last year, but the functionality supports archiving of non ITIL documents as well.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
id="com.glide.auxdb"
name="Data Archiving"
version="1.0.0"
invalidate_properties="false"
provider-name="ServiceNow"
state="published"
namespace="sn_archive">

<requires>
	<import plugin="com.snc.db.replicate"/>
</requires>

<extension point="com.glide.db.ddlchange.listener" name="ArchiveTableTableChange" class="com.glide.db.auxiliary.ArchiveDDLChangeListener" />
<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="ArchiveAccessHandler" class="com.glide.db.auxiliary.ArchiveAccessHandler"/>
<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="ArchiveRuleAccessHandler" class="com.glide.db.auxiliary.ArchiveRuleAccessHandler"/>

<description>Provides the ability to move a subset of data from large tables into archive tables. Typical candidates include historical ITIL documents such as incidents which were closed last year, but the functionality supports archiving of non ITIL documents as well.</description>
</plugin>

result.description: Automatically assigns work items to agents based on their availability, capacity, and skills.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.awa"
		name="Advanced Work Assignment"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		trackable="true"
		namespace="sn_awa">
	<description>Automatically assigns work items to agents based on their availability, capacity, and skills.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/>
	</requires>
  
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="AWA GraphQL Data Source"
		class="com.snc.awa.graphql.schema.AWASchema" />
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="Available agents list for manual assignment"
		class="com.snc.awa.graphql.schema.AvailableAgentsAndWorkitemDetailsSchema" />
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="InboxItems for active work item fetching"
			   class="com.snc.awa.graphql.schema.InboxItemSchema" />
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="AWA info for document"
			   class="com.snc.awa.graphql.schema.AWADocumentSchema" />
	
	<!-- record watcher responders -->
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="AWACapacityResponder" class="com.snc.awa.responders.WorkloadResponder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="AWAChannelEligibilityResponder" class="com.snc.awa.responders.ChannelEligibilityResponder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="WorkItemResponder" class="com.snc.awa.responders.WorkItemResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="AWAOutboundResponder" class="com.snc.awa.responders.AWAOutboundResponder"/>

	<!-- worker threads -->
	<extension point="com.glide.worker_thread" name="assignment_engine" class="com.snc.awa.engines.WorkItemAssignmentWorker"/>

	<!-- scriptable utils -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StatsUtil" class="com.snc.awa.utils.ScriptableStatsUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceChannelUtils" class="com.snc.awa.utils.ScriptableServiceChannelUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkItemAssignmentManager" class="com.snc.awa.utils.ScriptableAssignmentManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AgentCapacityManager" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableAgentCapacityManager" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AgentPresenceManager" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableAgentPresenceManager" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AwaQueue" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableQueue"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Agent" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableAgent"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AgentTransfer" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableAgentTransfer"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Events" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableEventLogger"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="QueueMetrics" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableQueueMetrics"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceChannelMetrics" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableServiceChannelMetrics"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AWAOutboundEventUtils" class="com.snc.awa.utils.ScriptableAWAOutboundEventUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ExternalAWAService" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableExternalAWAService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceChannel" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableServiceChannel"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Skill" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableSkill"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AWADocument" class="com.snc.awa.api.scriptable.ScriptableAWADocument"/>

	<!-- rest apis -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="RoutingService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.RoutingService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AgentService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.AgentService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ManualAssignService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.ManualAssignService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PresenceQueryHistoryService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.PresenceQueryHistoryService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="InboxActionsService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.InboxActionsService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AgentConsultService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.AgentConsultService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="OfferWorkService" class="com.snc.awa.api.rest.OfferWorkService"/>

	<!-- xml stats -->
	<extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="advancedworkassignment" class="com.snc.awa.stats.XMLStatsAWA" />
	<extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="awa_channel_metrics" class="com.snc.awa.stats.XMLStatsAWAChannelMetrics" />
	
	<extension point="com.glide.awa.stats" name="queue_metrics" order="1" class="com.snc.awa.stats.channel.metrics.QueueMetricsBuilder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.awa.stats" name="channel_metrics" order="2" class="com.snc.awa.stats.channel.metrics.ChannelMetricsBuilder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.awa.stats" name="agent_metrics" order="3" class="com.snc.awa.stats.channel.metrics.AgentMetricsBuilder" />
	
	
	<extension point="com.glide.monitor" name="WorkloadRecalculationMonitor" class="com.snc.awa.stats.WorkloadRecalculationMonitor" />
</plugin>
result.name: Advanced Work Assignment

result.description: Enhances Business Rules to support script-free conditions and behaviors
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

result.description: Provides a real-time messaging platform that connects you to your coworkers, bypassing email and static documents.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.connect"
		name="Connect"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		cache_flush="false"
		licensable="true">

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed"/>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.live_common"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.angularui"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.notification.push"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.db_audio"/>
	</requires>

	<description>Provides a real-time messaging platform that connects you to your coworkers, bypassing email and static documents.</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_group" class="com.glide.connect.group.GroupsService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="conversation" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.ConversationService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_search" class="com.glide.connect.search.LiveSearchService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_notifications" class="com.glide.connect.notification.NotificationService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_actions" class="com.glide.connect.actions.ActionsService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="live_profile_service" class="com.glide.connect.profile.ProfileService" />

	// deprecated services
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_message" class="com.glide.connect.message.ConnectMessageService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="collaborators" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.CollaborationService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_configuration" class="com.glide.connect.notification.ConnectConfigurationService" />

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConnectActionResponse" class="com.glide.connect.actions.ConnectActionResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideConversation" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.GlideConversation"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Collaborator" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.Conversation"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConnectListeners" class="com.glide.connect.ConnectListeners"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="Connect Data Source" class="com.glide.connect.graphql.schema.ConnectSchema" />
</plugin>

result.description:
These REST APIs can be used to build a Continuous Integration and Continuation Delivery (CICD)
		pipeline for your ServiceNow instances. You can automate publishing and installing applications
		from an application repository, activating plugins, running ATF test suites, and running an
		instance HealthScan
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.continuousdelivery"
		name="Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) REST API"
		state="published"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		type="feature_set"
		trackable="true"
		namespace="sn_cicd">

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.automated_testing_framework"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.source_control"/>
		<import plugin="com.sn_appclient" />
		<import plugin="com.sn_appauthor" />
		<import plugin="com.sn_appcreator" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.instance_scan" />
	</requires>

	<description>
		These REST APIs can be used to build a Continuous Integration and Continuation Delivery (CICD)
		pipeline for your ServiceNow instances. You can automate publishing and installing applications
		from an application repository, activating plugins, running ATF test suites, and running an
		instance HealthScan
	</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ATFSuiteExecutionService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDATFSuiteExecutionEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PluginActivationService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDPluginEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AppStoreService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDAppRepoEndpointV1"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AppStoreServiceV2" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDAppRepoEndpointV2"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ApplyChangesVCSService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDApplyChangesVCSEndpointV1"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ApplyChangesVCSServiceV2" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDApplyChangesVCSEndpointV2"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GetProgressService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDGetProgressEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="InstanceScanService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDInstanceScanEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="BatchInstallService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDBatchInstallEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ImportService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDImportVCSEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="StashService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDStashEndPoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="UpdateSetService" class="com.glide.cicd.endpoint.CICDUpdateSetEndpoint"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) REST API

result.description: Activates Virtual Agent adapters for third-party messaging applications
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.glide.cs.adapter"
	name="Glide Conversation Server Adapters"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	namespace="sn_cs_adapter"
        licensable="true">

	<description>Activates Virtual Agent adapters for third-party messaging applications</description>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="SlackWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.slack.SlackWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VAProxySlackWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.slack.VAProxySlackWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="FacebookWorkplaceWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.fb.FacebookWorkplaceWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VAProxyFacebookWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.fb.VAProxyFacebookWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="FacebookMessengerWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.fb.FacebookMessengerWebhookResource"/>
	<!-- Java classes for MS Teams extension points are defined in glide-service-ms-teams project. In continuous upgrade testing, if we move extension points, they become undefined till the plugin is re-processed by the upgrade process -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="MsWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.msft.MsWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VAProxyTeamsWebhookResource" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.msft.VAProxyTeamsWebhookResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SlackEnterpriseUpgrader" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.slack.SlackEnterpriseUpgrader" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="VaLinkAccountUtil" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.VaLinkAccountUtil" />
	
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SlackToken" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.slack.SlackToken" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OutboundAuthToken" class="com.glide.cs.qlue.module.clientproxy.OutboundAuthToken" />

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.cs"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.external.app"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.channelproxy"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.bot_install_ui"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.cs.notification"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>

result.description: Support for XOAUTH and XOAUTH2 email authentication
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.email.oauth"
   name="Email: OAUTH support for IMAP, Microsoft Graph (Receiving), and SMTP"
   version="1.0.0"
   state="published"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   startup="com.glide.email.oauth2.pluginstartup.EmailOAuthPluginStartup">
   <description>Support for XOAUTH and XOAUTH2 email authentication</description>
   <!-- 
   	    this plugin requires JRE 1.5 or later due to a dependency on javax.security.sasl 
   -->
   <requires>
     <import plugin="com.glide.email_accounts"/>
     <import plugin="com.snc.platform.security.oauth"/>
   </requires>
   <extension point="com.glide.email.reader" name="IMAPOAuthReader" auth="oauth" type="imap" class="com.glide.email.oauth.IMAPOAuthReader" />
   <extension point="com.glide.email.sender" name="SMTPOAuthSender" auth="oauth" type="smtp" class="com.glide.email.oauth.SMTPOAuthSender" />
   
   <extension point="com.glide.email.sender" name="SMTPOAuth2Sender"  auth="oauth2" type="smtp" class="com.glide.email.oauth2.smtp.SMTPOAuth2Sender" />
   <extension point="com.glide.email.reader" name="IMAPOAuth2Reader" auth="oauth2" type="imap" class="com.glide.email.oauth2.imap.IMAPOAuth2Reader" />
</plugin>
result.name: Email: OAUTH support for IMAP, Microsoft Graph (Receiving), and SMTP

result.description: Generate unpredictable watermarks, and enable matching on these watermarks in inbound emails.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.email.random_watermark"
		name="Random Watermark Support" 
		state="published"
		help=""
		invalidate_properties="false"
		provider_name="Service-now.com"
		version="1.0.0">

	<requires>
		<!-- "fix_watermark_default.xml" also made original changes to sys_watermark.number dictionary default
		      Ensure our fix script, which updates that default, runs after --> 
		<import plugin="com.glide.mailbox" />
	</requires>

	<description>
		Generate unpredictable watermarks, and enable matching on these watermarks in inbound emails.
	</description>

</plugin>
result.name: Random Watermark Support

result.description:
Separation of the sending of SMS/Email by adding a column to the Email Table.  Prevents SMS messages from slowing down Email message sending and vice versa. 
		Activation of this plugin will cause email to stop sending during activation, on systems with large email tables this can take hours, and is not recommended.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.email_sms_separation" 
		name="Email/SMS Separation" 
		state="published" 
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
        version="1.0"
        licensable="false">

	<description>
		Separation of the sending of SMS/Email by adding a column to the Email Table.  Prevents SMS messages from slowing down Email message sending and vice versa. 
		Activation of this plugin will cause email to stop sending during activation, on systems with large email tables this can take hours, and is not recommended.
	</description>
	
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.notification"/>
	</requires>		
</plugin>
result.name: Email/SMS Separation

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.guided_tours" 
        provider_name="ServiceNow"
        trackable="true"  
        state="published"
        name="Guided Tours"
        namespace="sn_tours"
	    version="1.0.0">

	<description>A guided tour provides a walk-through of a procedure in a UI page. Administrators can develop customized guided tours to assist users with specific business processes within an organization.</description>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GuidedTourService" class="com.glide.guided_tours.GuidedTourService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TourDataService" class="com.glide.guided_tours.TourDataService"/>
    <requires>
    	<import plugin="com.glideapp.dashboards" />
        <import plugin="com.snc.par.dashboards" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.hopscotch"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.embedded_help"/>
	</requires>
	
</plugin>
result.name: Guided Tours

result.description: Suite of plugins necessary to support the Flow Designer Designer App
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.hub"
   name="Flow Designer - Installer"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="ServiceNow"
   after_install_or_upgrade="conditional_activate.js"
   state="published">

	<description>Suite of plugins necessary to support the Flow Designer Designer App</description>
	<requires>
		<!-- ordering is important for the following plugin set -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_engine" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_reporting" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_reporting.dashboard" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.outbound_tracking"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.feature_tracking"/>

		<!-- system-level Step Type primitives -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.log" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.script" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.crud" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.notification" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.core" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.service_catalog" />
		<!-- model plugin itself imports all the required Process Flow core component plugins -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.designer_backend.model" />

		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.content_filtering" />

		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_health_check_tool" />

		<!-- system-level Action Type primitives, e.g. GlideRecord CRUD Actions (requires model plugin installed first) -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.email" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.sms" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_type.system" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.connect_v3plus.core.ah" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.designer"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.email_header"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.email_attachments"/>

		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_designer_embedded_help"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_designer_guided_tours"/>

    <import plugin="com.sn_dependentclient"/>		
	</requires>
 </plugin>
result.name: Flow Designer - Installer

result.description: Provides runtime components to support Flow Designer.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.hub.flow_engine"
   name="Flow Designer - Flow Engine"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   startup="com.snc.process_flow.engine.PFEngineStartup"
   namespace = "sn_ph"
   >

	<requires>
			<import plugin="com.glide.stages"/>
			<import plugin="com.glide.kmf.global"/>
			<import plugin="com.glide.db.unreferenced_record_cleaner"/>
			<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow.encryption"/>
	</requires>
	
	<description>Provides runtime components to support Flow Designer.</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="FlowResponder" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.FlowResponder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="FlowResponderDelete" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.FlowResponderDelete" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="FlowResponderSync" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.FlowResponderSync" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="FlowResponderDeleteSync" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.FlowResponderDeleteSync" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="PFResponder" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.PFResponder" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="PFResponderDeleted" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.PFResponderDeleted" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="PFResponderSync" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.PFResponderSync" />
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="PFResponderDeletedSync" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.PFResponderDeletedSync" />
	<extension point="com.glide.stages.IElementStagesProvider" name="PFStagesProvider" class="com.snc.process_flow.stages.PFStagesProvider" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideProcessAutomation" class="com.snc.process_flow.GlideProcessAutomation_JS"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FDSLATimer" class="com.snc.process_flow.FDSLATimer"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="FlowContextDBListener" class="com.snc.process_flow.engine.serialization.FlowContextDBListener" />
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PlanInfo" class="com.snc.process_flow.PlanInfo_JS"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideSQLEscapeUtils" class="com.snc.process_flow.GlideSQLEscapeUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideShellEscapeUtils" class="com.snc.process_flow.GlideShellEscapeUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="flowstats" class="com.glide.process_flow.stats.XMLFlowStats"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.internal_timer" name="process_engine_secure_store_cleaner" class="com.snc.process_flow.encryption.secure_storage.ProcessEngineSecureDataCleaner"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Flow Designer - Flow Engine

   id="com.glide.hub.flow_trigger"
   name="Flow Designer Action Trigger"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   namespace="sn_flow_trigger">

	<requires>
        <import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_engine"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.cobject"/>
	</requires>

	<description>Action plans that map a Trigger (Record, Email, REST) to an Action</description>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FlowTriggerAPI" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.trigger.ScopedTriggerAPI" />
 	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TriggerAPI" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.trigger.TriggerAPI" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TriggerAPIService" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.trigger.TriggerAPIService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="trigger_engine" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.engine.TriggerEngine" />
	<extension point="com.glide.flow_trigger" name="FDTriggerRunner" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.engine.RecordTriggerRunner" />
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="TriggerRunnerMappingDBListener" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.trigger.TriggerRunnerMappingDBListener"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.vtable.evaluator_provider" name="FlowEvaluatorProvider" class="com.glide.flow_trigger.trigger.vtable.FlowEvaluatorProvider" />
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.schema" name="TriggerDesignerSchema" class="com.glide.trigger_design.graphql.TriggerDesignerSchema" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TriggerDesignerService" class="com.glide.trigger_design.rest.TriggerDesignerService"/>
</plugin>

result.description: It generates a unique identifier for an identity using a hashing function. The output is known as "Federated ID" which is a hash that is created using a default or custom selection criteria that then can be used to cross-reference if the same hash exists across multiple ServiceNow instances.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.identity.globalid"
        name="Federated ID Generation"
        state="published"
        trackable="true"
        version="1.0.0"
        provider_name="ServiceNow"
        namespace="sn_identity">
        <description>It generates a unique identifier for an identity using a hashing function. The output is known as "Federated ID" which is a hash that is created using a default or custom selection criteria that then can be used to cross-reference if the same hash exists across multiple ServiceNow instances.</description>

        <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FederatedIDGenerationHelper"
                   class="com.glide.identity.globalid.api.ScopedFederatedIDGenerationHelper"/>
        <extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="FederatedIdGenerationResourceScriptEngine"
                   class="com.glide.identity.globalid.service.FederatedIdGenerationResourceScriptEngine"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Federated ID Generation

result.description: Activates the Interactions Management System
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.interaction"
		name="Interactions Management"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		licensable="true"
		namespace="sn_interaction">

	<description>Activates the Interactions Management System</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.agent_workspace.list" />

Notification providers are a flexible way to add new notification channels or 
		change the way existing notifications are delivered
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.notification.provider" 
		name="Notification Providers"
		state="published"
		help="Notification_Providers"
		namespace="sn_notification"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		version="1.0.0">

	<description>
		Notification providers are a flexible way to add new notification channels or 
		change the way existing notifications are delivered
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.notification" />
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="notification_provider_engine"
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.NotificationProviderEngine" />
		
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Action"
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.scriptable.NotificationActionJavascriptProxy" />

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotificationActionService" 
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.scriptable.NotificationActionServiceScriptable" />
		
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AdvancedNotificationRecipients" 
      class="com.glide.notification.loader.AdvancedNotificationRecipients"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Preferences"
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.scriptable.PreferencesJavascriptProxy" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PreferenceDestination"
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.scriptable.PreferenceDestinationJavascriptProxy" />
		
	<extension point="com.glide.notification.provider" name="ExecutionLoggerFactory" 
		class="com.glide.notification.provider.ExecutionLoggerFactoryImpl" />

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ProviderNotification"
			   class="com.glide.notification.provider.scriptable.NotificationJavascriptProxy"/>

</plugin>
result.name: Notification Providers

result.description: Adds support for push notifications to the notification system.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.notification.push"
		name="Notification System Push Addon" 
		state="published"
		help="Adds support for push notifications to the notification system" 
		provider_name="Service-now.com"
		version="1.0.0">

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.notification" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.push" />
	</requires>

	<description>
		Adds support for push notifications to the notification system.
	</description>
	
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PushRegistrationService" class="com.glide.notification.push.service.PushRegistrationRestService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PushActionService" class="com.glide.notification.push.service.PushActionRestService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PushMobileOperation" class="com.glide.notification.push.service.PushMobileOperationRestService" />

</plugin>
result.help: /api/now/v1/context_doc_url/Adds support for push notifications to the notification system
result.name: Notification System Push Addon

result.description: Unified framework to register capabilities with common specification for multiple builders.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.glide.one_extend"
	name="Glide OneExtend"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	startup="com.glide.one_extend.rate.limit.OneExtendRateLimitPluginStartup"
	namespace="sn_one_extend">

	<description>Unified framework to register capabilities with common specification for multiple builders.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.oneapi.fdih"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.hub.internal_client.authorizer" name="OemAuthorizationService" class="com.glide.one_extend.service.OemAuthorizationService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="OneExtendResource" class="com.glide.one_extend.resource.OneExtendResource"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OneExtendUtil" class="com.glide.one_extend.script.ScriptableOneExtendUtil" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OneExtendDataRemodel" class="com.glide.one_extend.script.ScriptableDataRemodel" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GenerativeAIUtility" class="com.glide.one_extend.script.ScriptableGenerativeAIUtility" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SkillUtility" class="com.glide.one_extend.script.ScriptableSkillUtility" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NowAssistUserSetter" class="com.glide.one_extend.script.ScriptableNowAssistUserSetter" />
	<!-- A/B Testing extension points -->
	<extension point="com.glide.evaluation.artifact.provider" name="GenAIArtifactProvider" class="com.glide.one_extend.abtesting.GenerativeAIABTestingArtifactProvider"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.evaluation.parameter.type" name="GenAIModelEvaluation" class="com.glide.one_extend.abtesting.GenerativeAIABTestingModelEvaluation"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.evaluation.signal.provider" name="GenAISignalsProvider" class="com.glide.one_extend.abtesting.GenerativeAIABTestingSignalsProvider"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.evaluation.parameter.score" name="GenAIHelpfulness" class="com.glide.one_extend.abtesting.GenerativeAIABTestingHelpfulness"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.js_query_access.handler" name="GenAILogAccessHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAILogAccessHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="GenAILogAccessHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAILogAccessHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.js_query_access.handler" name="GenAIRestrictedTableHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAIRestrictedTableHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="GenAIRestrictedTableHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAIRestrictedTableHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.js_query_access.handler" name="GenAIRestrictedTableHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAIRestrictedReadAndWriteTableHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="GenAIRestrictedTableHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.genai.configuration.GenAIRestrictedReadAndWriteTableHandler"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.script.js_query_access.handler" name="OneExtendAccessHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.configuration.OneExtendAccessHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="OneExtendAccessHandler" class="com.glide.one_extend.configuration.OneExtendAccessHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.one.extend.service" name="OneExtendService" class="com.glide.one_extend.service.OneExtendServiceExternalImpl"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Glide OneExtend

result.description: Predictive Intelligence enables the creation of machine learning solutions using data in your instance. The plugin provides various capabilities and solution types for training the system to predict, recommend, and drive data outcomes. A trained solution can be invoked by any application through the use of a prediction API.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.platform_ml"
   name="Predictive Intelligence"
   version="1.0.0"
   state="published"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   namespace="sn_ml"
   licensable="false"
   trackable="true"
   license_model="capacity">
   <description>Predictive Intelligence enables the creation of machine learning solutions using data in your instance. The plugin provides various capabilities and solution types for training the system to predict, recommend, and drive data outcomes. A trained solution can be invoked by any application through the use of a prediction API.</description>
   <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideMLService" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.rest.GlideMLService"/>
   <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Predict API" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.rest.PredictiveIntelligenceAPI"/>
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.service_request_handler" name="TreeSimilarityMLServiceRequestHandler" class="com.snc.treesimilarity.TreeSimilarityMLServiceRequestHandler" />
   
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideHelper" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.ScopedGlideHelper" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SolutionOverrides" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.ScopedSolutionOverrides" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Solution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.Solution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TreeSimilarityPredictor" class="com.snc.treesimilarity.TreeSimilarityPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TreeSimilarityTrainer" class="com.snc.treesimilarity.TreeSimilarityTrainer" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TreeSimilarityAttachmentWriter" class="com.snc.treesimilarity.TreeSimilarityAttachmentWriter" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SolutionDefinition" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.SolutionDefinition" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SolutionFinder" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.SolutionFinder" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Outcome" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.Outcome" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SolutionStats" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.SolutionStats" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLRecordUtil" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.util.MLRecordUtil" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLFixScriptUtil" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.util.MLFixScriptUtil" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLArtifactCleaner" class="com.glide.platform_ml.models.artifacts.MLArtifactCleaner" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLServiceUtil" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.util.MLServiceUtil" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLFeedbackService" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.feedback.MLFeedbackService" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideRecordViewUtil" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.util.GlideRecordViewUtil" />

   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TrainingRequest" class="com.glide.platform_ml.TrainingRequest" />
   <extension point="com.glide.document_job" name="ml_training_request_schedule" class="com.glide.platform_ml.TrainingRequestJob" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="category_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="priority_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="assignment_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="classification_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="similarity_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="clustering_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   <extension point="com.glide.ml.trainer_type" name="regression_trainer" class="com.snc.ml.solutionscommon.predictor.SolutionPredictor" />
   
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLSolutionFactory" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLSolutionFactory" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLSolution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLSolution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLClassification" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLClassification" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLSimilarity" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLSimilarity" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLClustering" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLClustering" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Sentencer" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.Sentencer" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MLRegression" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.MLRegression" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DatasetDefinition" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.DatasetDefinition" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClassificationSolution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.ClassificationSolution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClassificationSolutionVersion" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.solutionversion.ClassificationSolutionVersion" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClassificationSolutionStore" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.store.ClassificationSolutionStore" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SimilaritySolution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.SimilaritySolution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SimilaritySolutionVersion" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.solutionversion.SimilaritySolutionVersion" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SimilaritySolutionStore" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.store.SimilaritySolutionStore" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClusteringSolution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.ClusteringSolution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClusteringSolutionVersion" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.solutionversion.ClusteringSolutionVersion" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClusteringSolutionStore" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.store.ClusteringSolutionStore" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RegressionSolution" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.RegressionSolution" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RegressionSolutionVersion" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.solutionversion.RegressionSolutionVersion" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RegressionSolutionStore" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.store.RegressionSolutionStore" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Encoder" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.definition.Encoder" />
   <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="EncoderVersion" class="com.glide.platform_ml.api.solution.solutionversion.EncoderVersion" />

result.description: REST API Framework to support RESTful Services
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.rest"
	name="REST API Provider"
	state="published"
	version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_ws">	
	<description>REST API Framework to support RESTful Services</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.heisenberg" />
	</requires>
	
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.virtual_host" name="rest" class="com.glide.rest.host.RESTAPIProvider" />
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RouteTemplateMatcher" class="com.glide.rest.util.RouteTemplateMatcher"/>
    
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="APIDoc" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.APIDocService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="APITableDesc" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.APIDocTableDescService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TableCRUDAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.table.TableAPIService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TableCRUDV2API" class="com.glide.rest.service.table.TableAPIV2Service"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ImportSetAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.impset.ImportSetAPIService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AggregateAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.stats.StatsAPIService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AttachmentAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.attachment.AttachmentAPIService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="SessionNotificationAPI" class="com.glide.rest.session.impl.SessionNotificationService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="BatchAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.batch.BatchAPIService"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="UISessionAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.session.UISessionService"/>
        
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTMessageV2" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTMessageClient"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTResponseV2" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTMessageTest" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTMessageTestUIAction"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.outbound.message_client" name="RESTMessageClient" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.RESTMessageClient"/>

   	<extension point="com.glide.transaction.monitor" name="RESTTransactionMonitor" class="com.glide.rest.processors.RESTTransactionMonitor"/>
   	
   	<extension point="com.glide.rest.tools" name="GlideRecordFromMapConverter" class="com.glide.rest.util.GlideRecordFromMapConverter"/>
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServicesRetriever" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableServicesRetriever"/>
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableServiceInfo"/>
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="VersionInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableVersionInfo"/>
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ResourceInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableResourceInfo"/>
   	
   	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AMBSessionService" class="com.glide.rest.amb.AMBSessionService"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.application_resource_limiter.request" name="RestScopeFinder" class="com.glide.rest.service.RestScopeFinderFactory"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UriMatcher" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableUriMatcher"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UriMatcherResponse" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableUriMatcherResponse"/>
</plugin>

result.description: Remote Tables allow an application developer to expose a tabular result set backed by custom business logic
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.glide.script.vtable"
	name="Remote Tables"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	state="published"
	namespace="sn_vtable">

	<description>Remote Tables allow an application developer to expose a tabular result set backed by custom business logic</description>
	<extension point="com.glide.db.table_factory.extender" name="ScriptableITableFactory" class="com.glide.script.vtable.ScriptableITableFactory" />
	<extension point="com.glide.internal_timer" name="flush_expired_scriptable_table_data" class="com.glide.script.vtable.cache.FlushExpiredEntriesTimer"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RemoteTableManager" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.ScriptableRemoteTableManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ColumnDefinition" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.ScriptableColumnDefinition"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SimpleResponse" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.response.ScriptableSimpleResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ColumnDefinitionResponse" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.response.ScriptableColumnDefinitionResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RemoteTableDefinition" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.ScriptableRemoteTableDefinition"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RemoteTableAccessPolicy" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.ScriptableRemoteTableAccessPolicy"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.vtable.evaluator_provider" name="VScriptEvaluatorProvider" class="com.glide.script.vtable.VScriptEvaluatorProvider" />
	<extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="RemoteTable" class="com.glide.script.vtable.XMLStatsVScriptableTable"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RemoteTableCacheManager" class="com.glide.script.vtable.api.ScriptableRemoteTableCacheManager"/>


	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.transform"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Remote Tables

result.description: Guided app creator enables customers to quickly and effortlessly create new applications. Within a few clicks, users can transform their Excel spreadsheets into data tables, enabling them to harness the power of the platform. result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

		state="published" type="application" startup="com.glide.digitalsignature.DigitalSignaturePluginStartup"
		licensable="true" namespace="sn_vcs">
	<description>Source control integration applies and commits changes in an external repository</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.ha" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.system_update_set"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SourceControlErrorInfoFinder" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.SourceControlErrorInfoFinder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SourceControlHistoryFinder" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.SourceControlHistoryFinder"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Branches" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Branches"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommitDetails" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CommitDetails"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Commits" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Commits"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommitStashPreview" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CommitStashPreview"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CreateBranch" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CreateBranch"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CreateTag" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CreateTag"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GenerateStashPreview" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.GenerateStashPreview"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OutgoingChanges" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.OutgoingChanges"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RemovedOutgoingChanges" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.RemovedOutgoingChanges"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StolenOutgoingChanges" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.StolenOutgoingChanges"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RefreshRepository" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.RefreshRepository"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UpdateRepoConfig" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.UpdateRepoConfig"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Repositories" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Repositories"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RepositoryWorkers" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.RepositoryWorkers"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SourceControl" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.SourceControl"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Stashes" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Stashes"/>

result.description: APIs for altering the behavior of any 'apply_once' update in a plugin during plugin activation/upgrade.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.glide.system_apply_once"
	name="Apply Once APIs"
	version="1.0.0"
	namespace="sn_applyonce"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>
		<!--
		The plugin is to register the ApplyOnce APIs and the APIs needs to be made
		available as early as possible during zboot and upgrade, so we added this
		plugin as the first plugin to be imported in 'com.glide.core' and
		'com.glide.core_new' for zboot, and added a 'before' fix script to load
		the plugin at the beginning of upgrade. Please keep the the sequence
		where the plugin is be imported. Otherwise, any script that is loaded before
		it may not be able to use the ApplyOnce APIs
		-->
		APIs for altering the behavior of any 'apply_once' update in a plugin during plugin activation/upgrade.
	</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ApplyOnce" class="com.glide.update.ApplyOnce"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Apply Once APIs

result.description:
Hopscotch is a framework to make it easy for developers to add product tours to their pages. 
        Hopscotch accepts a tour JSON object as input and provides an API for the developer to control rendering the tour display 
        and managing the tour progress.

	    To learn more about Hopscotch and the API, check out http://linkedin.github.io/hopscotch.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.ui.hopscotch"
	name="Hopscotch"
	version="0.2.5" 
	state="published"
    provider_name="ServiceNow">
    
    <description>
        Hopscotch is a framework to make it easy for developers to add product tours to their pages. 
        Hopscotch accepts a tour JSON object as input and provides an API for the developer to control rendering the tour display 
        and managing the tour progress.

	    To learn more about Hopscotch and the API, check out http://linkedin.github.io/hopscotch.
    </description>
			   
</plugin>
result.name: Hopscotch

result.description: Visual Task boards with lanes - structured or ad-hoc
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.ui.vtb" name="Visual Task Boards" state="published" version="2.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow"
		licensable="true" namespace="sn_vtb">
	<description>Visual Task boards with lanes - structured or ad-hoc</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.font_icons"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.task"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.checklist"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.filter"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.magellan_navigator_api"/> <!-- For the favorites lib (FavoriteProcessor.java) -->
	</requires>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Board" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBBoard"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FreeformBoard" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBFreeformBoard"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FlexibleBoard" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBFlexibleBoard"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GuidedBoard" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBGuidedBoard"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BoardManager" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBBoardManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="LaneManager" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBLaneManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CardManager" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.scriptable.ScriptableVTBCardManager"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="vtb" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.VTBProcessor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="vtb_stream" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.VTBActivityProcessor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="vtb_card_history_tracker"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.history.CardHistoryTracker"/>
	<!-- Services -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbBoardService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.BoardService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbLaneService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.LaneService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbCardService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.CardService"/>

	<!-- AMB -->
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="LaneResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.LaneResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="CardResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.CardResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="TaskResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.TaskResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardMemberResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardMemberResponder"/>
	<!-- TODO: Groups on hiatus -->
	<!--<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardGroupResponder"-->
			   <!--class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardGroupResponder"/>-->
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="ChecklistResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.ChecklistResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="ChecklistItemResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.ChecklistItemResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="AttachmentResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.AttachmentResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardLabelResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardLabelResponder"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="LabelEntryResponder"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.LabelEntryResponder"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource"
			   name="VTB schema"
			   class="com.glide.ui.vtb.graphql.schema.VisualBoardSchema" />

</plugin>
result.name: Visual Task Boards

result.description: The Visual Task Board (VTB) Spoke for the Flow Designer provides Actions enable process analysts to compose flows that manipulate task boards, cards, board members, and assignees on given tasks without having to write code. The Visual Task Board Plugin (com.glide.ui.vtb.ah) should be installed to use these actions.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.ui.vtb.ah"
   name="Visual Task Board Flow Designer Spoke"
   state="published"
   version="1.1.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   licensable="false">
   
    <requires>
        <import plugin="com.glide.ui.vtb"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.hub.designer_backend.model" />
    </requires>
    
    <description>
        The Visual Task Board (VTB) Spoke for the Flow Designer provides Actions enable process analysts to compose flows that manipulate task boards, cards, board members, and assignees on given tasks without having to write code. The Visual Task Board Plugin (com.glide.ui.vtb.ah) should be installed to use these actions.
    </description>
 </plugin>
result.name: Visual Task Board Flow Designer Spoke

<plugin id="com.glide.update_operation.queue" name="Update Operation Queue" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow"
		namespace="sn_ale_queue" state="published">
	<description>Queue for update operations</description>

result.description: Tracks affected table records touched (insert/update/delete) by loading files during system upgrade, zboot, or plugin activation/upgrade. This plugin adds application modules that allow ServiceNow employees to access the upgrade blame log and to turn on/off the feature. It also adds security access control rules to prevent users from modifying the upgrade blame logs table.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<plugin id="com.glide.upgrade_blame"
		name="Upgrade Blame Tool"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published">
	<description>Tracks affected table records touched (insert/update/delete) by loading files during system upgrade, zboot, or plugin activation/upgrade. This plugin adds application modules that allow ServiceNow employees to access the upgrade blame log and to turn on/off the feature. It also adds security access control rules to prevent users from modifying the upgrade blame logs table.</description>
</plugin>

result.description: The Management, Instrumentation, and Discovery (MID) Server is a Java application that runs as a Windows service or UNIX daemon. The MID Server facilitates communication and movement of data between the ServiceNow platform and external applications, data sources, and services.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glideapp.agent"
   name="MID Server"
   state="published"
   help="MID_Server"
   version="1.0.0"
   afterload="on_plugin_activation.js"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   startup="com.glideapp.ecc.ECCPluginStartup"
   licensable="false">
	
	<requires>
   		<import plugin="com.glide.custom_web_service"/>
   		<import plugin="com.glide.dist_download_proxy"/>
   		<import plugin="com.glide.kmf.global"/>
    </requires>
	
    <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="mid_config_options" class="com.glide.ui.jelly.tags.form.MIDConfigOptionsTag"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="NGMidServerUser" class="com.glideapp.ecc.NGMidServerUser"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="MidClusterDBListener" class="com.snc.discovery.database.MidClusterDBListener" />
	<extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="ecc_queue" class="com.snc.core_automation.stats.ECCQueueXMLStatProvider" default_include="false" />	
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ECCAgentJREVersionUtil" class="com.glideapp.ecc.ECCAgentJREVersionUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MidEccSender" class="com.snc.core_automation.js.MidEccSenderJS"/>
	<description>The Management, Instrumentation, and Discovery (MID) Server is a Java application that runs as a Windows service or UNIX daemon. The MID Server facilitates communication and movement of data between the ServiceNow platform and external applications, data sources, and services.</description>
</plugin>
result.name: MID Server

result.description: Installs the core Knowledge Management items used to allow other Knowledge related plugins to work, such as Knowledge V3, Knowledge Advanced, Knowledge Service Portal and so on.This plugin is activated by default.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glideapp.knowledge"
   name="Knowledge Management Core"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   help="CSHelp:Knowledge_Management"
   state="published"
   trackable="true"
   licensable="false">
   <description>Installs the core Knowledge Management items used to allow other Knowledge related plugins to work, such as Knowledge V3, Knowledge Advanced, Knowledge Service Portal and so on.This plugin is activated by default.</description>
   <requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.user_criteria"/>
        <import plugin="com.snc.db.rotation"/>
        <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed_v2"/>
        <import plugin="com.glideapp.report.knowledge.overview"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.script.vtable"/>
    </requires>
    
      <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.glideapp.knowledge_columns" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KnowledgeColumnsTag2"/>
      <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.glideapp.knowledge_attachment" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KnowledgeAttachmentTag2"/>
	  <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.glideapp.knowledge_section" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KnowledgeSectionTag2" />
      <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="KBTreeData" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KBTreeData"/>
      <extension point="com.glide.knowledge.tools" name="knowledge" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KBTools" />
     

    <extension point="com.glide.globalsearch.config" name="KnowledgeArticle" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.KnowledgeGlobalSearchConfig" />
    
    <!-- extension points moved from V3 Plugin -->
    <!-- Glide Scriptable exposed Javascript classes //-->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KnowledgeHelper" class="com.snc.knowledge3.js.KnowledgeHelper"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KnowledgeSearch" class="com.snc.knowledge3.js.KnowledgeSearch"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KnowledgeTopRankedArticles" class="com.snc.knowledge3.js.KnowledgeTopRankedArticles"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KnowledgeIcon" class="com.snc.knowledge3.js.KnowledgeIcon"/>

	<!-- Angular Processors //-->
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_article_processor" 				class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGArticleProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_advanced_search_processor" 		class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGAdvancedSearchProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_search_filter_processor" 		class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGSearchFilterProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_top_ranked_articles_processor" 	class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGTopRankedArticles" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_read_processor"					class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGKnowledgeImportProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="my_knowledgebases_processor" 				class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGMyKnowledgeBasesProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="knowledge_tags_processor" 				    class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGKnowledgeTagsProcessor" />

	<!-- Knowledge live feed commenting engine --> 
    <extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="KnowledgeCommentsEngine" class="com.snc.knowledge3.comments.engine.KnowledgeCommentsEngine" />
    <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="glide_record_search_processor"       class="com.snc.knowledge3.processors.NGGlideRecordSearchProcessor" />

	<!-- Global search config for social q & a questions -->
	<extension point="com.glide.globalsearch.config" name="SocialQAQuestion" class="com.snc.knowledge3.globalsearch.SocialQAGlobalSearchConfig" />
        <extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="KnowledgeStaleCacheListener" class="com.snc.knowledge.cache.KnowledgeStaleCacheListener" />
        <extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="GraphQL schema for Knowledge management features" class="com.snc.knowledge.graphql.schema.AppKnowledgeSchema" />
        <extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="GraphQL schema for Knowledge Blocks" class="com.snc.knowledge_blocks.graphql.schema.KnowledgeBlocksSchema" />
 	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="CSMAttachmentAPIService" class="com.glideapp.knowledge.CSMAttachmentAPIService"/>

result.definition:

<plugin
	id="com.glideapp.password_reset"
	name="Password Reset"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	cache_flush="false"
	type="application"
	state="published"
	trackable="true">
	<description>It is a core Password Reset plugin. It enables the ability to manage your local ServiceNow password via Password Reset Application. </description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdVerificationType" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdVerificationType"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdVerification" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdVerification"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdWorkflowManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdWorkflowManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdUtil" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdUtil"/> 
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdSecurityManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdSecurityManager"/> 
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdExtensionScript" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdExtensionScript"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdExtensionScriptParameter" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdExtensionScriptParameter"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdMultifactorAuthUtilWrapper" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdMultifactorAuthUtilWrapper"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdHistoryManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdHistoryManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdUserManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdUserManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdEmailManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdEmailManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdIdentificationType" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdIdentificationType"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PwdSoftPINManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.PwdSoftPINManager"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MapRequestToVerificationManager" class="com.glideapp.password_reset.javascript.MapRequestToVerificationManager"/>
