result.description: Enables the creation of workflows that drive automated processes. This may entail generating tasks based on conditions, running scripts, generating approvals, or other actions. Satisfies the same need as the Execution Plans plugin but with greater control and an easier interface.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glideapp.workflow"
   name="Workflow Runtime Engine"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   invalidate_properties="false"
   state="published"
   help="Workflow"
   trackable="true">

    <description>Enables the creation of workflows that drive automated processes. This may entail generating tasks based on conditions, running scripts, generating approvals, or other actions. Satisfies the same need as the Execution Plans plugin but with greater control and an easier interface.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.stages"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.diagrammer"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.vars"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.schedules"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.relative_duration"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.web_service_application"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.service_api"/>
        <import plugin="com.snc.datastructure"/>
        <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed"/>  
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="Workflow" class="com.glideapp.workflow.engine.WorkflowEngine" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowPaths" class="com.glideapp.workflow.model.WorkflowPaths" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowStageRenderer" class="com.glideapp.workflow.stages.WorkflowStageRenderer" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RendererAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.stages.RendererAPI" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowPaths" class="com.glideapp.workflow.model.WorkflowPaths" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowScriptAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.WorkflowScriptAPI" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ElementVersionAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.element.ElementVersionAPI" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="workflow_schedule" class="com.glide.ui.jelly.tags.form.WorkflowScheduleTag2" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DataStructureAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.element.DataStructureAPI" />
   	<extension point="com.glide.stages.IElementStagesProvider" name="WorkflowProvider" class="com.glideapp.workflow.stages.WorkflowStagesProvider" />
   	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="WFContextDBListener" class="com.glideapp.workflow.engine.WFContextDBListener" />
   	

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="WorkflowService" class="com.glideapp.workflow.rest.WorkflowService" />
</plugin>
result.name: Workflow Runtime Engine

result.description:
This plugin provides a generic set of artifacts to handle subscriptions for any defined subscribable object. 
   	Any entity can be defined as a subscribable object and a set of subscribers can subscribe to the objects. When a event occurs related
   	to the subscribable object, activities can be tracked and subscribers can be notified.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.activity_subscriptions"
   name="Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   help="Activity_Subscriptions"
   type="feature_set"
   licensable="false"
   namespace="sn_actsub"
>
   <description>This plugin provides a generic set of artifacts to handle subscriptions for any defined subscribable object. 
   	Any entity can be defined as a subscribable object and a set of subscribers can subscribe to the objects. When a event occurs related
   	to the subscribable object, activities can be tracked and subscribers can be notified.</description>
      <requires/>

    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ActSubCache" class="com.snc.actsub.cache.ActSubCache"/>
 </plugin>
result.name: Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework

result.description:
The plugin helps enterprises have visibility into their Business Applications Inventory, rationalize Business Applications, provide business context and determine business value of each Business Application. 
	Also helps have understanding of the technology (Software and Hardware) components of Business Applications, capture the organizations Information Assets and Business Applications use of those Information Assets.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

   id="com.snc.apm"
   name="Enterprise Architecture"

   help="Application_Portfolio_Management"
   type="application"
   version="1.0.0"

	The plugin helps enterprises have visibility into their Business Applications Inventory, rationalize Business Applications, provide business context and determine business value of each Business Application. 
	Also helps have understanding of the technology (Software and Hardware) components of Business Applications, capture the organizations Information Assets and Business Applications use of those Information Assets.
	</description>

	</requires>
 </plugin>

result.description: Core components and helpers for a JSON request/response model.  Includes JSON and XML transports for NG and GlideAjax support.  An extension of the processor framework.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.application.json_service"
        name="JSON Service request/response model"
        version="1.0.0"
        state="published"
        provider_name="ServiceNow"
        type="application">

    <description>
		Core components and helpers for a JSON request/response model.  Includes JSON and XML transports for NG and GlideAjax support.  An extension of the processor framework.
    </description>
    
    <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceRequest" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceRequestImpl" />
    <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceResponse" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceResponseImpl" />
    <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceStatus" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceStatusImpl" />
    <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="List" class="com.snc.application.json_service.util.JSONSerializableArrayList" />
    <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="Map" class="com.snc.application.json_service.util.JSONSerializableHashMap" />
    
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceStatus" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableServiceStatus" />
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="JSONSerializableMap" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableJSONSerializableMap" />
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="JSONSerializableList" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableJSONSerializableList" />
</plugin>

result.description: Survey Management application enables you can create surveys, send surveys, collect responses, analyze and share survey results.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.assessment_core" name="Assessment" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="Assessments" type="application"
	provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="false" trackable="true" namespace="sn_assessment_core" license_model="producer">

	<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="AssessmentEngineAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentEngineAjax" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.assessment_core_take" class="com.snc.assessment_core.TakeAssessment" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.sample_assessment" class="com.snc.assessment_core.SampleAssessment" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.asmt_attachment_list" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentAttachmentTag" />
	<description>
		Survey Management application enables you can create surveys, send surveys, collect responses, analyze and share survey results.
	</description>
	
	 <requires>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.workflow"/>
		<!-- <import plugin="com.glideapp.survey"/> -->
		<!-- <import plugin="com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey"/> -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.assessment_designer"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.survey_designer"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.cs.validator"/>
     </requires>
	<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="ScorecardAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ScorecardAjax" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="ComparisonAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ComparisonAjax" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="DecisionMatrixAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.DecisionMatrixAjax" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AssessmentCreation" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentCreation" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScopedAssessmentCreation" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ScopedAssessmentCreation"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SetAssessmentResults" class="com.snc.assessment_core.SetAssessmentResults" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Rating" class="com.snc.assessment_core.Rating" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AssessmentUpgradeHelper" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentUpgradeHelper" />
	<extension point="com.glide.service_portal.assessment" name="AssessmentCreation" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentCreation" />
</plugin>
result.name: Assessment

result.description:
Core change management plugin which both Change Management State Model and Standard Change Catalog plugins depend on.

This plugin will update the Type field on Change Request to have the values normal, standard and emergency.
The Type value on existing Change Requests will be updated:
	Routine -> standard (Standard)
	Comprehensive -> normal (Normal)
	Emergency -> emergency (Emergency)

When creating a Change Request an interceptor will prompt you for the Type of Change you want to create.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin help="CSHelp:Change-Management-Core"
		id="com.snc.change_management"
		licensable="true"
		name="Change Management - Core"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		version="1.0.0">

	<description>Core change management plugin which both Change Management State Model and Standard Change Catalog plugins depend on.

This plugin will update the Type field on Change Request to have the values normal, standard and emergency.
The Type value on existing Change Requests will be updated:
	Routine -> standard (Standard)
	Comprehensive -> normal (Normal)
	Emergency -> emergency (Emergency)

When creating a Change Request an interceptor will prompt you for the Type of Change you want to create.</description>

	<requires>
   		<import plugin="com.snc.change_request"/>
   		<import plugin="com.snc.change.collision"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Change Management - Core

result.description: This plugin activates the Change Conflict Calendar introduced in the Kingston release. It enables you to view a change request and its potential conflicts once a primary configuration item, planned start date, and planned end date have been provided within a Change request.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin help="Change_Management"
		id="com.snc.change_request_calendar"
		licensable="true"
		name="Change Request Calendar"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		version="1.0.0">

	<description>This plugin activates the Change Conflict Calendar introduced in the Kingston release. It enables you to view a change request and its potential conflicts once a primary configuration item, planned start date, and planned end date have been provided within a Change request.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.app.calendar"/>
	</requires>
 </plugin>
result.name: Change Request Calendar

result.description: The MetricBase plugin helps developers working on IoT-based applications that monitor or act on machine-generated data. The plugin includes the MetricBase database that stores the data. You can visualize the data using the ServiceNow platform reporting feature or create triggers to execute Flow Designer flows.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.clotho"
		name="MetricBase"
		version="1.1.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		namespace="sn_clotho"
		licensable="true"
		license_model="capacity"
		state="published">

	<description>
		The MetricBase plugin helps developers working on IoT-based applications that monitor or act on machine-generated data. The plugin includes the MetricBase database that stores the data. You can visualize the data using the ServiceNow platform reporting feature or create triggers to execute Flow Designer flows.
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.services" />
		<!-- used by metric viewer -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.highcharts" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.flow_trigger"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.rrd.writer_impl" name="clotho" class="com.snc.clotho.rrd.ClothoRrdWriter"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rrd.reader_impl" name="clotho" class="com.snc.clotho.rrd.ClothoRrdReader"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="ClothoTriggerFlowSubjectResponder" class=" com.snc.clotho.triggers.ClothoTriggerFlowSubjectResponder" />\
	
	<!-- scriptable objects -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClothoConnectionTest" class="com.snc.clotho.scriptable.ScopedClothoConnectionTest"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.cloud.api" name="Cloud API" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_cloud_api"
		scope_name="sn_capi" scope_sys_id="0f7325250b21220033bc05ae37673a53" state="published"

	<description>Cloud API Framework - API implementations to integrate with cloud vendors like AWS, Azure, VMware, GCP, OpenStack etc.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.core.automation"/>

	</requires>
	<!-- REST services -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="CAPIOrchestratorServiceAPI"
			   class="com.snc.cmp.cloud.api.modules.orchestrator.service.rest.CAPIOrchestratorServiceAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="CAPILibraryServiceAPI"
			   class="com.snc.cmp.cloud.api.modules.library.service.rest.CAPILibraryServiceAPI"/>
	<!-- scriptable objects -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CAPILibraryServiceScript"
			   class="com.snc.cmp.cloud.api.modules.library.scriptinterface.CAPILibraryServiceScript"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CAPIOrchestratorServiceScript"
			   class="com.snc.cmp.cloud.api.modules.orchestrator.scriptinterface.CAPIOrchestratorServiceScript"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.javascript" name="scripts/CloudApiSCClient.js"/>
</plugin>

   licensable="false">

    <!-- Extensions for CMDB -->

    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MultiSourceAnalytics" class="com.snc.cmdb.multisource.query.MultiSourceAnalyticsScriptableApi"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DuplicateTemplate" class="com.snc.cmdb.duplicate_merge.template.DuplicateTemplateScriptableApi"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PartialPayloadParser" class="com.snc.cmdb.identify_reconcile.partial_payload.PartialPayloadParser"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DynamicIREScriptableAPI" class="com.snc.cmdb.dynamic_ire.util.DynamicIREScriptableAPI"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ProductInstance" class="com.snc.cmdb.product_instance.ProductInstanceScriptableApi"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBWSScriptUtil" class="com.snc.cmdb.workspace.util.script.CMDBWSScriptUtil" />
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBRetirementScriptableApi" class="com.snc.cmdb.ci_lifecycle.CMDBRetirementScriptableApi" />
    <!-- API exposed for IntegrationHub ETL app -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBIntStudioScriptableAPI" class="com.snc.cmdb.studio.CMDBIntStudioScriptableAPI" />
    <!-- CMDB Attachment Util (cross scope access) -->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBAttachmentUtil" class="com.snc.cmdb.util.script.CMDBAttachmentUtil" />
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBQBScopedScriptableAPI" class="com.snc.cmdb.query.CMDBQBScopedScriptableAPI"/>

result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.contextual_search"
        name="Contextual Search"
        version="1.1.0"
        state="published"
        provider_name="ServiceNow"
        type="application"
        namespace="sn_cxs">

    <description>
		Contextual search helps users deflect or quickly resolve their issues without involving the service desk operators. Contextual search can include results from Knowledge and other sources such as a service catalog, allowing a user to directly order a catalog item from a search.
    </description>

        <import plugin="com.snc.application.json_service" />

    <extension point="com.glide.request_manager.cancelation_decider" name="ContextualSearchCancelationDecider" class="com.snc.contextual_search.request.ContextualSearchCancelationDecider"/>

    <!-- Scoped scriptable components -->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CXSUIConfig" class="com.snc.contextual_search.script.ScriptableCXSUIConfig" />
</plugin>

result.description:
This demo application enables Twilio integration using Notify and OpenFrame to provide softphone functions and call center capabilities. The demo application includes capabilities tomake, receive phone calls, transfer, hold and mute. Applications like Customer Service and Incident Management provide demo workflows for CTI. 
Please re-activate respective applications where you require CTI demo workflows.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
  id="com.snc.cti"
  name="CTI Softphone"
  version="0.0.1"
  provider_name="ServiceNow"
  cache_flush="false"
  state="published"
  type="application"
  licensable="true"
  help="CSHelp:Customer-Service-Management-CTI-Overview">
  <requires>
    <import plugin="com.snc.matching_rule"/>
    <import plugin="com.sn_openframe"/>

  <description>This demo application enables Twilio integration using Notify and OpenFrame to provide softphone functions and call center capabilities. The demo application includes capabilities tomake, receive phone calls, transfer, hold and mute. Applications like Customer Service and Incident Management provide demo workflows for CTI. 
Please re-activate respective applications where you require CTI demo workflows.
  </description>
</plugin>

result.definition:

<plugin id="com.snc.db.rotation" 
	name="Database Rotation"
	version="1.0.1"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow">

	<description>Provides the ability to break large tables into smaller, more manageable tables  these smaller tables contain a specified period of data and the table with oldest data is purged on an on-going basis.</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationSynchronizer"  class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationSynchronizer" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationBootstrap"  class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationBootstrap" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationField"  class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationField" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationList" class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationList" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationScheduleEntry" class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationScheduleEntry" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableRotationUtil" class="com.glide.db.rotation.TableRotationUtil" />
</plugin>

result.description: Document  viewer  is  a  platform feature  that  will  enable  users  to  view  enterprise  class  documents inline within the platform attachment instead of  downloading  it  to  the  local  device  and  then  opening  the documents with  a  locally  installed  viewer.
result.definition:

<plugin id="com.snc.documentviewer" 
        provider_name="ServiceNow" 
        name="ServiceNow Document Viewer"
        state="published"
	    version="1.0.0"
	    namespace="sn_docviewer"
	    trackable="true">

	   	<requires>	
			<!-- Enable PDF Generation Utilities -->	
			<import plugin="com.snc.apppdfgenerator"/>	
		</requires>

	<description>Document  viewer  is  a  platform feature  that  will  enable  users  to  view  enterprise  class  documents inline within the platform attachment instead of  downloading  it  to  the  local  device  and  then  opening  the documents with  a  locally  installed  viewer.</description>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DocumentConversionCleanup" class="com.snc.documentconverter.utils.DocumentConversionCleanup"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DocumentConversionOnDemand" class="com.snc.documentconverter.DocumentConversionOnDemand"/>

</plugin>

result.description: Core geolocation capabilities
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.geolocation" name="Geolocation" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="GeoLocation_Plugin"
	type="application" provider_name="ServiceNow">

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoLocation" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoLocation" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoAgent" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoAgent" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoLatLong" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoLatLong" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoRouting" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoRouting" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoTask" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoTask" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GeoDateUtil" class="com.snc.geolocation.GeoDateUtil" />

	<description>
		Core geolocation capabilities
	</description>
</plugin>
result.name: Geolocation

result.description: UI components and utilities for managing application files in the global scope.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.global_app_files"
		name="Global Application File Management"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		type="feature_set"
		trackable="true"
		namespace="sn_gfiles">
	<description>UI components and utilities for managing application files in the global scope.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.scripted_rest_services"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/>
	</requires>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlobalApp" class="com.glide.metadata.global_app.api.GlobalApp" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlobalAppMetaRecord" class="com.glide.metadata.global_app.api.GlobalAppMetaRecord" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlobalAppResponse" class="com.glide.metadata.global_app.api.GlobalAppResponse" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlobalAppMoveResponse" class="com.glide.metadata.global_app.api.GlobalAppMoveResponse" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ClaimAPI" class="com.glide.update.claim.ClaimAPI" />
</plugin>
result.name: Global Application File Management

result.description:
Customer Service Household: Enables managing customer service for consumers belonging to the same household. 
    Provides the ability to define the members of a household and relationships between them.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.household"
   name="Customer Service Household"
   state="published"
   licensable="true"
   help="Customer Service Household"
   scope_name="sn_csm_household"
   scope_sys_id="26ace622b3930010700b4d43c6a8dcd3"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow">
   
    <requires>
        <import plugin="com.snc.cs_base_extension"/>
    </requires>
    
    <description>Customer Service Household: Enables managing customer service for consumers belonging to the same household. 
    Provides the ability to define the members of a household and relationships between them.
    </description>
 </plugin>
result.name: Customer Service Household

result.description: ServiceNow Cross-domain Identity Management
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin 
	id="com.snc.integration.scim2.provider" 
	name="SCIM v2 - ServiceNow Cross-domain Identity Management" 
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	namespace="sn_auth">
	
	<description>ServiceNow Cross-domain Identity Management</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.platform.security.oauth"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.rest"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.rest.policy"/>
	</requires>

    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2ServiceProviderConfigEndpoint"  class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2ServiceProviderConfigEndpoint"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2ResourceTypesEndpoint"  class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2ResourceTypesEndpoint"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2SchemasEndpoint"        class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2SchemasEndpoint"/>

    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2UsersEndpoint"          class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2UsersEndpoint"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2GroupsEndpoint"         class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2GroupsEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2CompaniesEndpoint"      class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2CompaniesEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2DepartmentsEndpoint"    class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2CostCentersEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2CostCentersEndpoint"    class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2DepartmentsEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlideSCIM2LocationsEndpoint"      class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.provider.services.SCIM2LocationsEndpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SCIM2Util"   class="com.snc.integration.scim.v2.utils.ScopedSCIM2Util"/>

</plugin>

result.description: Activate this plugin to enable support for Web Authentication(FIDO2).
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.integration.webauthn" 
		name="Integration - Web Authentication"
		type="integration" 
		help="web-authentication" 
		version="1.0.0" 
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>
		Activate this plugin to enable support for Web Authentication(FIDO2).
	</description>
	
	<requires>
      <import plugin="com.snc.integration.multifactor.authentication"/>
    </requires>

result.description: Similarity Analyzer provides Trend Definition form that allows administrators to configure what types of trends they would like to be on the look out for within similar records. For example, you may want to scan similar records for a common value, or related record. You can even set thresholds for what you warrant as a true trend. For example, whether the same Knowledge Article was attached more than 3 times. Similarity Analyzer service is used in conjunction with Agent Assist Recommendations and can be extended for any use case requiring the analysis of a cluster or group of records.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<plugin 
	id="com.snc.intel_analyzer"
	name="Similarity Analyzer"
	state="published"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	scope_name="sn_intel_analyzer"
	type="application"
	scope_sys_id="c3354d2f73032300e64cc1f52ff6a7c7"
	licensable="false" >
	<description>Similarity Analyzer provides Trend Definition form that allows administrators to configure what types of trends they would like to be on the look out for within similar records. For example, you may want to scan similar records for a common value, or related record. You can even set thresholds for what you warrant as a true trend. For example, whether the same Knowledge Article was attached more than 3 times. Similarity Analyzer service is used in conjunction with Agent Assist Recommendations and can be extended for any use case requiring the analysis of a cluster or group of records.</description>
</plugin>
result.name: Similarity Analyzer

result.description: Provides GraphQL schema for contextual search sources like Knowledge and Social Q&A
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql"
        name="GraphQL Schema for Knowledge in Contextual Search"
        version="1.0.0"
        state="published"
        provider_name="ServiceNow"
        type="application"
        namespace="sn_cxs_kg">

    <description>
		Provides GraphQL schema for contextual search sources like Knowledge and Social Q&A
    </description>

    <requires>
        <import plugin="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql" />
    </requires>

    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema" name="GraphQLCXSTagType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.TagType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result" name="GraphQLCXSSocialQAType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.SocialQAType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result" name="GraphQLCXSKnowledgeType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.KnowledgeArticleType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result" name="GraphQLCXSPinnedArticleType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.PinnedArticleType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result_meta" name="GraphQLCXSSocialQAMetaType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.SocialQAMetaType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result_meta" name="GraphQLCXSKnowledgeMetaType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.KnowledgeArticleMetaType" />
    <extension point="com.snc.contextual_search.graphql.schema.result_meta" name="GraphQLCXSPinnedArticleMetaType" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.PinnedArticleMetaType" />
    <extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="Knowledge Article Notes GraphQL Data Source" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.schema.KnowledgeArticleSchema" />
    <extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="Knowledge Article Notes GraphQL Data Source (deprecated)" class="com.snc.knowledge3.graphql.schema.KnowledgeArticleSchemaOld" />
</plugin>
result.name: GraphQL Schema for Knowledge in Contextual Search

result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.nlq"
		name="Natural Language Query"
		version="2.0.0"
		licensable="false"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		trackable ="true"
		namespace="sn_nlq">

	<description>Enable this plugin to activate the Natural Language Query (NLQ) service in ServiceNow UI. NLQ translates natural language utterances into glide queries and retrieves information from Glide DB. Beginning in Orlando, this capability is exposed through Analytics Center.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.platform_ml" />
		<import plugin="com.snc.par.nlq.core" />

result.description: Provides powerful platform features for workflow-driven voice calls, conference calls, and SMS messages making it possible to create flexible Interactive Voice Response (IVR) systems to do virtually anything. Requires the Twilio Direct Driver and a separate contract with Twilio for SMS and Voice capabilities.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.snc.notify"
	name="Notify"
	version="3.1.0"
	type="feature_set"
	state="published"
	help="Notify"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	trackable="true"
	namespace="sn_notify"
	after_install_or_upgrade="fix_script.js">
	<description>Provides powerful platform features for workflow-driven voice calls, conference calls, and SMS messages making it possible to create flexible Interactive Voice Response (IVR) systems to do virtually anything. Requires the Twilio Direct Driver and a separate contract with Twilio for SMS and Voice capabilities.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.phone_number"/>
        <import plugin="com.snc.sms_pref"/>
	</requires>
    <!-- Notify main api //-->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Notify"            class="com.snc.notify.js.NotifyAPI"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotifyScoped"      class="com.snc.notify.js.NotifyScopedAPI"/>
	
    <!-- Notify child classes //-->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotifyPhoneNumber" class="com.snc.notify.NotifyPhoneNumber"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotifyAction"      class="com.snc.notify.NotifyAction"/>

    <!-- Notify Actions //-->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConferenceAction"  class="com.snc.notify.actions.ConferenceAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DialAction"        class="com.snc.notify.actions.DialAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GatherAction"      class="com.snc.notify.actions.GatherAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HangUpAction"      class="com.snc.notify.actions.HangUpAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PlayAction"        class="com.snc.notify.actions.PlayAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="QueueAction"       class="com.snc.notify.actions.QueueAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RecordAction"      class="com.snc.notify.actions.RecordAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RejectAction"      class="com.snc.notify.actions.RejectAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SayAction"         class="com.snc.notify.actions.SayAction"/>
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMSAction"         class="com.snc.notify.actions.SMSAction"/>
    
    <!-- Extension points for Microsoft Teams Notify Connector Authentication Helper API -->
    <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="MsNotifyAuthHelper" class="com.snc.notify.js.MsNotifyAuthHelperAPI"/>
 </plugin>

result.description: Provides the ability to create on-call schedules and escalation trees. When an incident is created, dynamically route the escalation to an on-call resource. On Call allows you to configure and build different on-call schedules per process and assignment group. When utilizing the Notify plugin, resources can use SMS and Voice escalations to interact with the escalation to acknowledge incidents etc. Escalations can be logged and reported on. These logs can be archived and purged when the Data Archiving plugin is active.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin 
  id="com.snc.on_call_rotation"
  name="On-Call Scheduling"
  version="2.0.0"
  state="published"
  type="application"
  provider_name="ServiceNow"
  help="CSHelp:On-Call_Scheduling"
  after_install_or_upgrade="activate_notify_extensions.js"
  trackable="true"
  licensable="false">

  <description>Provides the ability to create on-call schedules and escalation trees. When an incident is created, dynamically route the escalation to an on-call resource. On Call allows you to configure and build different on-call schedules per process and assignment group. When utilizing the Notify plugin, resources can use SMS and Voice escalations to interact with the escalation to acknowledge incidents etc. Escalations can be logged and reported on. These logs can be archived and purged when the Data Archiving plugin is active.</description>

  <requires>
    <import plugin="com.glide.schedules" />
    <import plugin="com.glide.notification" />
    <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng" />
    <import plugin="com.snc.app.calendar" />
    <import plugin="com.snc.fullcalendar" />
    <import plugin="com.glide.script.vtable" />
    <import plugin="com.sn_on_call_m_notif" />
    <import plugin="com.glide.rest.policy" />
    <import plugin="com.glide.tokenbased_auth" />
  </requires>

  <!-- Java classes scriptable API -->
  <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallRotation" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallRotationJS" />
  <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallURLGenerator" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallURLGeneratorJS" />
  <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallCompatibility" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallCompatibilityJS" />
  <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallRoster" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallRosterJS" />
</plugin>
result.name: On-Call Scheduling

result.description: This plugin will introduce a new unique identifier column for the outage table. This plugin is activated automatically for all instances except those who already have a number prefix column on the outage table. Please do not activate this plugin if you have a number prefix for cmdb_ci_outage table. Please read KB0823685 article, to learn how to uptake the OOB number column via this plugin.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
		id="com.snc.outage_numbering"
		name="Outage Numbering"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		trackable="true"
		state="published">
	<description>This plugin will introduce a new unique identifier column for the outage table. This plugin is activated automatically for all instances except those who already have a number prefix column on the outage table. Please do not activate this plugin if you have a number prefix for cmdb_ci_outage table. Please read KB0823685 article, to learn how to uptake the OOB number column via this plugin.</description>
</plugin>
result.name: Outage Numbering

result.description: Performance Analytics allows to automate recurring information needs with scorecards and dashboards and by taking configurable snapshots of any data at regular intervals.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.pa"
	name="Performance Analytics"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	help="CSHelp:Performance-Analytics"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	cache_flush="true"
	trackable="true">

	<description>
		Performance Analytics allows to automate recurring information needs with scorecards and dashboards and by taking configurable snapshots of any data at regular intervals.
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.report" />
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.home.publishers" />
		<import plugin="com.snc.core.automation" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.usageanalytics" />
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa.ui" />
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa.analytics_task"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.par.visualization.migration"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.par.intelligence"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.par.correlation" />
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.element" name="breakdown_element" class="com.snc.pa.dc.GlideElementBreakdownElement" />

	<!-- enable schedule indicators email pdf generation -->
	<extension point="com.snc.pa.premium" name="indicatorID" class="com.snc.pa.schedule.EmailIndicatorGenerator" />
	<extension point="com.glide.document_job" name="sysauto_indicator" class="com.snc.automation.MailIndicatorJob" />
	<extension point="com.glide.document_job" name="sysauto_indicator_notifications" class="com.snc.pa.IndicatorNotificationJob" />
	<extension point="com.glide.document_job" name="sysauto_pa" class="com.snc.pa.dc.DataCollectorJob" />

	<extension point="com.glideapp.report.chart" name="pa" class="com.snc.pa.charts.download.Downloader" />

	<!-- PA Angular Processors -->
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_breakdowns" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGBreakdownsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_context_sensitive" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGContextSensitiveProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_dashboard_processor" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGDashboardProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_detailed_scorecard" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGDetailedScorecardProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_health" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGHealthProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_indicators" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGIndicatorsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_messages" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGMessagesProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_preference_processor" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGPreferenceProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_score_notes" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGScoreNotesProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_scorecard" class="com.snc.pa.ng.scorecards.NGScorecardsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_scores" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGScoresProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_stats_processor" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGStatsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_targets_processor" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGTargetsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_thresholds_processor" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGThresholdsProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="pa_widget" class="com.snc.pa.ng.NGWidgetProcessor" />

	<!-- PA Scriptable Objects -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PABreakdown" class="com.snc.pa.js.PABreakdown"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PABreakdownMapping" class="com.snc.pa.js.PABreakdownMapping"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="paDashboard" class="com.snc.pa.js.DashboardScript"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PADBView" class="com.snc.pa.js.PADBView"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PADesignMode" class="com.snc.pa.js.PADesignMode"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PADomainConfiguration" class="com.snc.pa.domain.js.JSDomainConfiguration"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PADomainUtils" class="com.snc.pa.domain.js.PADomainUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAFormula" class="com.snc.pa.js.ScriptablePAFormula"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAIndicator" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAIndicator"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAFormulaUtil" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAFormulaUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAMigrator" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAMigrator"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PARecordsCleaner" class="com.snc.pa.dc.cleaners.PARecordsCleaner"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAScore" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAScore"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAScorecard" class="com.snc.pa.api.PAScorecard"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAScoresBackUp" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAScoresBackUp"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAScript" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAScript"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PASnapshot" class="com.snc.pa.js.PASnapshot"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PATarget" class="com.snc.pa.js.PATarget"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PATextRecords" class="com.snc.pa.text.scriptable.JSTextRecords"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAUtils" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAUtils"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScopedPAFormula" class="com.snc.pa.js.ScopedPAFormula"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PANewScoresTableUpdater" class="com.snc.pa.js.PANewScoresTableUpdater"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAExternalCollectionCheck" class="com.snc.pa.dc.ExternalCollectionCheck"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PATextIndexUtils" class="com.snc.pa.text.scriptable.ScriptableTextIndex"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAMultiElementUtil" class="com.snc.pa.js.PAMultiElementUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScriptablePACollectionJob" class="com.snc.pa.js.ScriptablePACollectionJob"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScriptableChartsAPI" class="com.snc.par.charts.ScriptableChartsAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScriptableParDataAPI" class="com.snc.par.data.ScriptableParDataAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HSQLFileTimeStampModifier" class="com.snc.pa.dc.hsql.HSQLFileTimeStampModifier"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PACorrelationCalculation" class="com.snc.pa.correlation.js.ScriptableCorrelationCalculator"/>
	<!-- PA migration duplicates remover -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAMigrationDuplicatesRemover" class="com.snc.pa.migration.js.PAMigrationDuplicatesRemover"/>

	<!-- PA REST API -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Breakdown Sources" class="com.snc.pa.rest.BreakdownSources"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Breakdowns" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Breakdowns"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Comments" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Comments"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Detailed Scorecard" class="com.snc.pa.rest.DetailedScorecard" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Detailed ScorecardV2" class="com.snc.pa.rest.DetailedScorecardV2"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Domain Configuration API" class="com.snc.pa.domain.rest.DomainConfigurationService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Indicator Sources" class="com.snc.pa.rest.IndicatorSources"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Indicators" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Indicators"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Translation" class="com.snc.pa.i18n.I18NAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Preference Service" class="com.snc.pa.ds.preference.DetailedScorecardPreferenceAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Favorites Service" class="com.snc.pa.ds.favorites.FavoriteScorecardAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Scores" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Scores"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Targets" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Targets"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Text API" class="com.snc.pa.text.rest.TextAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Thresholds" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Thresholds"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Units" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Units"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Widgets" class="com.snc.pa.rest.Widgets"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics Collection Jobs" class="com.snc.pa.rest.CollectionJobs"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Scorecards" class="com.snc.pa.rest.ScorecardsService"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ScoreListService" class="com.snc.par.scorelist.ScoreListService"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics InForm" class="com.snc.pa.rest.InformAnalytics" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AMB Subscription Data REST API" class="com.snc.par.amb.rest.AMBSubscriptionDataService" />
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="DataSeriesPublicV1" class="com.snc.par.series.rest.v1.DataSeriesPublicResourceV1"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="DataSeriesV1" class="com.snc.par.series.rest.v1.DataSeriesResourceV1"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="DataSeriesV2" class="com.snc.par.series.rest.v2.DataSeriesResourceV2"/>

	<!--  PAR GraphQL Schema -->

result.description: KPI Signals is like Active Noise Cancelling for KPI scores. It helps you to focus only on those score values that could constitute a profound change in the relevant workflow or process. KPI Signals uses standard statistical methods to filter out noise from common variation, thereby highlighting anomalies that signal significant variation due to a special or attributable cause.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.pa.kpi_signals"
	name="Performance Analytics - KPI Signals"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	help="CSHelp:Performance-Analytics-KPI-Signals"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published">

	<description>KPI Signals is like Active Noise Cancelling for KPI scores. It helps you to focus only on those score values that could constitute a profound change in the relevant workflow or process. KPI Signals uses standard statistical methods to filter out noise from common variation, thereby highlighting anomalies that signal significant variation due to a special or attributable cause.
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa" />
		<import plugin="com.sn_kpi_signals" />
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="Performance Analytics KPI Signals"
			   class="com.snc.pa.predictive.PredictiveAPI"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PA XMR Signal Calculation Job for Automated Indicators"
			   class="com.snc.pa.predictive.jobs.ScriptableXMRSignalCalculator"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PA XMR Signal Calculation Job for Formula Indicators"
			   class="com.snc.pa.predictive.jobs.XMRFormulaIndicatorSignalCalculatorJob"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KPI Signal Email Utilities"
			   class="com.snc.pa.predictive.util.KpiSignalEmailUtils"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="KPI Signal Fix Scripts"
			   class="com.snc.pa.predictive.KPISignalsFixScripts"/>

</plugin>
result.name: Performance Analytics - KPI Signals

result.description:
Data Snapshots is an advanced analytics feature that can be enabled for automated and formula indicators.
		Once activated, the system automatically captures periodic snapshots of relevant data from the specified fact tables.
		These snapshots are then used to calculate indicator scores based on historical data over time. With Data Snapshots
		enabled, indicators can support multiple breakdowns and filtering, removing the previous restriction of
		just two levels of breakdowns. This enhancement allows for deeper and more flexible analysis,
		giving you greater control over your data.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.pa.mlb"
		name="Data Snapshots"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		help="multi-level-breakdowns"
		version="1.0.0"
		trackable="true"
		licensable="true"
		state="published"
		required_db_type_for_install="postgresql">
	<description>
		Data Snapshots is an advanced analytics feature that can be enabled for automated and formula indicators.
		Once activated, the system automatically captures periodic snapshots of relevant data from the specified fact tables.
		These snapshots are then used to calculate indicator scores based on historical data over time. With Data Snapshots
		enabled, indicators can support multiple breakdowns and filtering, removing the previous restriction of
		just two levels of breakdowns. This enhancement allows for deeper and more flexible analysis,
		giving you greater control over your data.
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa.dm.analytics"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAMLBConversion" class="com.snc.pa.nam.conversion.PAMLBConversion"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RowCountJob" class="com.snc.pa.nam.rowcount.RowCountJob"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="EnableMLB" class="com.snc.pa.nam.EnableMLB"/>

</plugin>
result.name: Data Snapshots

result.description:
Installing this plugin will migrate scores from old tables to new tables. To provide optimal performance, the Scores [pa_scores] table is being migrated to Scores Level 1 [pa_scores_l1] and Scores Level 2 [pa_scores_l2].
 During migration, you cannot collect, modify, or delete scores. Scheduled data collection and cleanup jobs will not run during migration.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.pa.migration"
	name="Performance Analytics - Scores Migration"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	help="CSHelp:Performance Analytics - Scores Migration"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	trackable="true">

	<description>Installing this plugin will migrate scores from old tables to new tables. To provide optimal performance, the Scores [pa_scores] table is being migrated to Scores Level 1 [pa_scores_l1] and Scores Level 2 [pa_scores_l2].
 During migration, you cannot collect, modify, or delete scores. Scheduled data collection and cleanup jobs will not run during migration.
	</description>

	<requires>
	  <import plugin="com.snc.pa" />
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PAScoresMigrationManager" class="com.snc.pa.migration.PAScoresMigrationManager"/>

</plugin>
result.name: Performance Analytics - Scores Migration

	state="published"

	trackable="true"
	licensable="true"
	license_model="capacity">

result.description: Platform as a Service
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.snc.paas"
	name="Platform as a Service"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	state="published"
	type="application">
	<description>Platform as a Service</description>
	<!-- This plugin must be after workflow -->
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.workflow"/>
	</requires>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HungReviewWorkflowResumer"
		class="com.snc.apps.hub.review.workflow.HungReviewWorkflowResumer" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SysRelatedListSaver"
		class="com.glide.update.SysRelatedListSaver" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="VersionCoalescerAPI"
		class="com.snc.apps.hub.coalescer.VersionCoalescerAPI" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PreviewerManager"
		class="com.glide.update.preview.PreviewerManager" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UpgradeManifestUtil"
			   class="com.glide.update.UpgradeManifestUtil" />
</plugin>

result.description: This plugin is the core plugin for PAR Dashboards API for Workspace.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.par.api.dashboards"
   name="Glide PAR Dashboards"
   version="1.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   licensable="false">
   <description>This plugin is the core plugin for PAR Dashboards API for Workspace.</description>

	<requires>
	</requires>

	<!--  Dashboards GraphQL Schema -->
	<extension point="com.glide.graphql.datasource" name="PAR Dashboards GraphQL" class="com.snc.par.dashboards.graphql.sharing.DashboardSharingSchema" />

	<!-- Extension Point for loading par dashboard-picker items -->
	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PAR Dashboards items" class="com.snc.par.dashboards.rest.routes.DashboardPickerResource"/>

	<!-- Extension Point for cancelation support in the API -->
	<extension point="com.glide.request_manager.cancelation_decider" name="DashboardPickerRestAPICancelationDecider" class="com.snc.par.dashboards.rest.routes.cancelation.DashboardPickerRestAPICancelationDecider"/>

</plugin>
result.name: Glide PAR Dashboards

result.description: This plugin is the core plugin for PAR Intelligence
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.par.intelligence" name="PAR Intelligence" version="1.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow"
		namespace="sn_par_intelligence">
	<description>This plugin is the core plugin for PAR Intelligence</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Forecast"
			   class="com.snc.par.intelligence.forecast.api.Forecast"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CustomInsight"
			   class="com.snc.par.intelligence.insight.api.CustomInsight"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service"
			   name="PAR Insights"
			   class="com.snc.par.recommendation.rest.InsightController"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.script.engine"
			   name="analytics_trigger_engine"
			   class="com.snc.par.intelligence.trigger.AnalyticsTriggerEngine"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service"
			   name="PAR Insights Action Service"
			   class="com.snc.par.recommendation.rest.InsightActionController"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object"
			   name="InsightACLUtilScriptable"
			   class="com.snc.par.intelligence.insight.js.InsightACLUtilScriptable"/>

	<extension point="com.glide.rest.service"

result.description: The implementation of OAuth 2.0 to support token granting and authentication
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.platform.security.oauth" name="OAuth 2.0" version="1.0.0" state="published" 
		provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_auth">
	<description>The implementation of OAuth 2.0 to support token granting and authentication</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.certificates"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.protocol_profile"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.legacy"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.kmf.global"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.auth.scope"/>
	</requires>
   
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthClient"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthClient"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthClientRequest"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthClientRequest"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthClientResponse"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthClientResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthAccessTokenResponse"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthAccessTokenResponse"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthStringMap"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthStringMap"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthToken"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthToken"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthJWTConfig"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthJWTConfig"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OIDCProviderTester"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.oidc.OIDCProviderTester"/>
   	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="JWTKeystoreAliasValidator"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.jwt.JWTKeystoreAliasValidator"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideJWTAPI"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.jwt.ScopedGlideJWTAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthAppAPI"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.scoped.api.ScopedOAuthAppAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthAppAPIResponse"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.scoped.api.ScopedOAuthAppAPIResponse"/>		   			   
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideOAuthRequestContext"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.ScopedGlideOAuthRequestContext"/>	
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthMidSelector"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.util.ScopedOAuthMidSelector"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ContinuousAuthenticationOAuthUtil"
			   class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.util.ContinuousAuthenticationOAuthUtil"/>
 </plugin>

result.description: Installs the core Service Management items used to allow other service-related plug-ins to work, such as Field Service, Facilities, HR, Legal, Finance, Marketing and the custom-app creator.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
		id="com.snc.service_management.core"
		name="Service Management Core"
		version="1.0.0"
		help="Service_Management"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		namespace="sn_sm"
		licensable="true"
		license_model="mixed">

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.automatic_assignment"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.asset_management"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.state_flows"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.territory_management"/>
	    <import plugin="com.snc.document_management"/>
	    <import plugin="com.snc.task_activity" />
	    <import plugin="com.snc.service_management.geolocation" />
	    <import plugin="com.glide.field.encryption.starter" />
	    <import plugin="com.snc.common_workbench"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.checklist"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.explicit_roles"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.task_dependency"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMMessageUtil" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMMessageUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMScheduleStatus" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMScheduleStatus"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMACLCreatorUtil" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMACLCreatorUtil" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMConfiguration" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMConfiguration"/>		
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScopedSMConfiguration" class="com.snc.service_management.core.fencing.ScopedSMConfiguration"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMAppFormCloner" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMAppFormCloner" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMConfigCompatibility" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMConfigCompatibility" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMTemplateCompatibility" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMTemplateCompatibility" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_sm_config_processor" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMConfigProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_sm_template_processor" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMTemplateProcessor" />
	<description>Installs the core Service Management items used to allow other service-related plug-ins to work, such as Field Service, Facilities, HR, Legal, Finance, Marketing and the custom-app creator.</description>
</plugin>

   id="com.snc.service_portfolio"

   version="1.1.0"

   type="application"

You can use this data to assign tasks based on skills, analyze skill gaps to identify coaching and training needs, optimize your workforce, create career growth plans, and perform skill-based hiring</description>

result.description:
Provides the core SLA functionality.
SLA Definitions provide conditions to start, pause, stop, cancel and reset Task SLAs against any Task type.
In addition, you can specify a schedule on the definition to define the working hours and also a workflow to run against each Task SLA which is typically used to generate notifications.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin help="CSHelp:Service-Level-Management"
		id="com.snc.sla"
		licensable="false"
		name="Service level management"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		trackable="true"
		version="1.0.0">

	<description>Provides the core SLA functionality.
SLA Definitions provide conditions to start, pause, stop, cancel and reset Task SLAs against any Task type.
In addition, you can specify a schedule on the definition to define the working hours and also a workflow to run against each Task SLA which is typically used to generate notifications.</description>

	<requires>
	    <import plugin="com.glideapp.workflow"/>
	    <import plugin="com.glide.schedules"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.relative_duration"/>
	</requires>
 
    <extension point="com.snc.process_flow.sla" name="timer_actions" class="com.snc.sla.flow.SLATimerActionUtils" />
 </plugin>
result.name: Service level management

result.description:
Provides the ability to generate breakdown data for each Task SLA record - for example by assignment group and assigned to
NOTE:	It is important that you have up to date versions of script includes TaskSLAController and RepairTaskSLAController before activating this plugin to ensure that breakdown data is generated correctly.
		If you have customized versions of either of these script includes, any customizations should be incorporated into the versions of these files from the most recent upgrade.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
    id="com.snc.sla.breakdowns"
    name="SLA Breakdowns"
    state="published"
    version="1.0.0"
    help="Service_Level_Agreements_(SLA)_Plugin"
    provider_name="ServiceNow"
	licensable="false"
	scope_name="sn_sla_brkdwn"
	scope_sys_id="6c11c4f357201300ff01ac11ac94f982">

	<description>Provides the ability to generate breakdown data for each Task SLA record - for example by assignment group and assigned to
NOTE:	It is important that you have up to date versions of script includes TaskSLAController and RepairTaskSLAController before activating this plugin to ensure that breakdown data is generated correctly.
		If you have customized versions of either of these script includes, any customizations should be incorporated into the versions of these files from the most recent upgrade.
    </description>

    <requires>
        <import plugin="com.snc.sla"/>
    </requires>
</plugin>
result.name: SLA Breakdowns

result.description:
Demo showing how encrypted form field's can be assigned to one encryption context. Adds two 
   	    encrypted fields to the task table (Social Security Numbers and Credit Cards), a read-only
   	    encryption context field, an "Add Secure Info" button which unhides these fields, and an 
   	    "Change Encryption" button to change the encryption context. After activating, personalize the 
   	    incident form to add the three fields mentioned above.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.task_encryption.demo"
   name="Encryption Support - Single Context Task Encryption Demo"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   help="Encryption_Support_Plugin"
   state="published">
   	<description>
   	    Demo showing how encrypted form field's can be assigned to one encryption context. Adds two 
   	    encrypted fields to the task table (Social Security Numbers and Credit Cards), a read-only
   	    encryption context field, an "Add Secure Info" button which unhides these fields, and an 
   	    "Change Encryption" button to change the encryption context. After activating, personalize the 
   	    incident form to add the three fields mentioned above.
	</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.field.encryption.starter"/>
	</requires>
 </plugin>
result.name: Encryption Support - Single Context Task Encryption Demo

result.description: Enable a unified content categorization across content types such as catalog items and knowledge articles.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	id="com.snc.taxonomy"
	name="Content Taxonomy"
	licensable="false"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	namespace="sn_taxonomy">
 <description>Enable a unified content categorization across content types such as catalog items and knowledge articles.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.user_criteria"/>
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.user_criteria.scoped.api"/>
	</requires>

	<!-- Cache DB listener registration-->
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="TopicStaleCacheListener" class="com.glide.taxonomy.cache.TopicStaleCacheListener" />

	<!-- Scriptable Object -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Taxonomy" class="com.glide.taxonomy.scriptable.TaxonomyJS"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Topic" class="com.glide.taxonomy.scriptable.TopicJS"/>
	<extension point="com.snc.knowledge.viewas" name="ECViewAs" class="com.glide.taxonomy.viewAs.ECViewAs" />
</plugin>
result.name: Content Taxonomy

result.description: The Restore deleted records plugin restores a deleted record and all audited references to that record.  We will also restore any records that were deleted as a result of a cascade delete rule.
result.definition:

result.description:
This spoke provides actions and subflows to build a Continuous Integration and Continuation
		Delivery (CICD) pipeline for your ServiceNow instances. You can automate publishing and installing
		applications from an application repository, activating plugins, running ATF test suites, and running
		an instance Instance Scan
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	version="2.0.1"
	id="com.sn_cicd_spoke"
	name="Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) Spoke"
	licensable="false"
	scope_name="sn_cicd_spoke"
	scope_sys_id="70fae9692b1c0200c5244f74b4da15d3"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	state="published">

	<description>
		This spoke provides actions and subflows to build a Continuous Integration and Continuation
		Delivery (CICD) pipeline for your ServiceNow instances. You can automate publishing and installing
		applications from an application repository, activating plugins, running ATF test suites, and running
		an instance Instance Scan
	</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.continuousdelivery"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.rest"/>
        <import plugin="com.glide.hub.integration.runtime"/>
    </requires>
</plugin>

result.description: Communities enable customers and employees with online forums to share ideas, experiences, and solutions. Capture these conversations to enhance self-service by harvesting knowledge while understanding your user engagement through analytics. The Community plugin is licensable through Customer Service Management and HR.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	version="27.1.17"
	id="com.sn_communities"
	name="Communities"
	licensable="true"
	scope_name="sn_communities"
	scope_sys_id="10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	state="published"
	help="CSHelp:servicenow-communities-overview"
	license_model="mixed"
	namespace="sn_csm_communities">

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.service-portal"/>
		<import plugin="com.sn_communities_global"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.activity_subscriptions"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.gamification"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.csm_unified_theme"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.assignment_workbench"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.processor.ics"/>
		<import plugin="com.sn_kb_social_qa"/>
		<import plugin="com.sn_communities_contextual_search"/>
	</requires>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommunityCache" class="com.snc.communities.cache.CommunityCache"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="CommunityDBListener" class="com.snc.communities.cache.CommunityDBListener" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommunityUtility" class="com.snc.communities.util.CommunityUtility" />
	
	<description>
             Communities enable customers and employees with online forums to share ideas, experiences, and solutions. Capture these conversations to enhance self-service by harvesting knowledge while understanding your user engagement through analytics. The Community plugin is licensable through Customer Service Management and HR.
	</description>
	
</plugin>

result.description: The Customer Service Management application enables you to provide service and support for your external customers using several communication channels, such as email, web, and telephone. A case is created to keep track of the issue reported or service requested, and assigned to groups or agents. Customer service agents in your organization work on the cases and resolve issues.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.sn_customerservice"
   name="Customer Service"
   version="27.2.20"
   state="published"
   licensable="true"
   help="CSHelp:Customer-Service-Management"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   license_model="mixed" >
   <requires>
	<import plugin="com.snc.asset_management"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.state_flows"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.assignment_workbench"/>   
	<import plugin="com.snc.cs_base"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.assessment_core"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.task_relations"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.task_activity"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.matching_rule"/>
	<import plugin="com.sn_resolutionshaper"/> 
	<import plugin="com.sn_openframe"/>
	<import plugin="com.sn_shn"/>
	<import plugin="com.sn_cs_social"/>
	<import plugin="com.snc.customer_service.spoke"/>
	<import plugin="com.glide.cs" />
	<import plugin="com.glide.va.sp_widgets" />
	<import plugin="com.snc.agent_workspace.csm" />
	<import plugin="com.snc.activity_subscriptions"/>
	<import plugin="com.glide.service-portal.customer-portal"/>
   </requires>
	<description>
		The Customer Service Management application enables you to provide service and support for your external customers using several communication channels, such as email, web, and telephone. A case is created to keep track of the issue reported or service requested, and assigned to groups or agents. Customer service agents in your organization work on the cases and resolve issues. 
	</description>
 </plugin>
result.name: Customer Service

Note: Workday integration that was available with this plugin has been deprecated.

	id="com.sn_hr_integrations"

It pushes HR profile information from HRSM to a third-party HR application and pulls HR profile information from a third-party HR application to HRSM. Note: Workday integration that was available with this plugin has been deprecated.
	</description>

result.description:
IMPORTANT: Use the Problem Management Migration Utility to verify that there are no modifications that you need to address before activating this plugin on your instance. The migration utility also helps you migrate your Problem and Problem Task records to the new best practice states.
    
The plugin provides support for state management to control how a Problem or a Problem Task is allowed to transition through a predefined list of states.

Problem states: New > Assess > Root Cause Analysis > Fix in Progress > Resolved > Closed
Problem Task states: New > Assess > Work in Progress > Closed
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
    id="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid.state_model"
    name="Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid - State Model"
    version="1.0.0"
    provider_name="ServiceNow"
    state="published"
    help="Problem-Management-Baseline-Madrid-State-Model"
    licensable="true">
    <description>IMPORTANT: Use the Problem Management Migration Utility to verify that there are no modifications that you need to address before activating this plugin on your instance. The migration utility also helps you migrate your Problem and Problem Task records to the new best practice states.
    
The plugin provides support for state management to control how a Problem or a Problem Task is allowed to transition through a predefined list of states.

Problem states: New > Assess > Root Cause Analysis > Fix in Progress > Resolved > Closed
Problem Task states: New > Assess > Work in Progress > Closed</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.problem.problem_model"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid - State Model

result.definition:

<plugin id="com.glide.scripted_rest_services.errors"
		name="Scripted REST APIs - Error types"
		state="published"
		version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_ws_err">
	<description>An internal-use plugin that has standard error codes for scripted REST APIs.</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableServiceError"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BadRequestError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableBadRequestError"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotAcceptableError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableNotAcceptableError"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UnsupportedMediaTypeError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableUnsupportedMediaTypeError"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConflictError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableConflictError"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotFoundError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableNotFoundError"/>
</plugin>

result.description: This plugin will update your /sp and /sp_config portals with the ServiceNow La Jolla branding.  The logo, favicon, login page background image, hero banner, theme, and widget instance options are updated when the portal record has not been modified.  When the portal record is modified no changes are made and an administrator can manually apply changes by downloading the La Jolla images from the db_image table and applying as well as updating the theme setting of the portal record.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.service-portal.themes.la-jolla"
		name="Service Portal La Jolla Branding"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>This plugin will update your /sp and /sp_config portals with the ServiceNow La Jolla branding.  The logo, favicon, login page background image, hero banner, theme, and widget instance options are updated when the portal record has not been modified.  When the portal record is modified no changes are made and an administrator can manually apply changes by downloading the La Jolla images from the db_image table and applying as well as updating the theme setting of the portal record.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.service-portal" />
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Service Portal La Jolla Branding
