result.description: Base plugin for assessment related designers like Quiz Designer, Survey Designer, Assessment designer. You must activate Assessment Designer Common plugin before using Quiz Designer, Survey Designer, or Assessment Designer. By default, this plugin is activated.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.glide.assessment_designer.common"
	name="Assessment Designer Common"
	state="published"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	licensable="false"
	trackable="true"
	invalidate_properties="false">
	<description>
		Base plugin for assessment related designers like Quiz Designer, Survey Designer, Assessment designer. You must activate Assessment Designer Common plugin before using Quiz Designer, Survey Designer, or Assessment Designer. By default, this plugin is activated.
	</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.dc"/>
	</requires>
	
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NGAssessmentUtil" class="com.glide.ui.ng.assessment_designer.common.NGAssessmentUtilJS"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="question_types" class="com.glide.ui.ng.assessment_designer.common.NGQuestionTypesProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="adc.group_users" class="com.glide.ui.ng.assessment_designer.common.NGGroupUsersProcessor" />
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="adc.recipients_list_users" class="com.glide.ui.ng.assessment_designer.common.NGRecipientsListUsersProcessor" />
</plugin>
result.name: Assessment Designer Common

result.definition:

result.description: Suite of plugins necessary to support the Flow Designer Designer App
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.glide.hub.designer_backend.suite"
   name="Flow Designer Designer Backend"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="ServiceNow"
   state="published">

	<description>Suite of plugins necessary to support the Flow Designer Designer App</description>
	<requires>
		<!-- ordering is important for the following plugin set -->

		<!-- system-level Step Type primitives -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.log" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.script" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.crud" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.email" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.notification" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.core" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_step.service_catalog" />

		<!-- model plugin itself imports all the required Process Flow core component plugins -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.designer_backend.model" />

		<!-- system-level Action Type primitives, e.g. GlideRecord CRUD Actions (requires model plugin installed first) -->
		<import plugin="com.glide.hub.action_type.system" />
	</requires>
 </plugin>
result.name: Flow Designer Designer Backend

result.description: Testing framework and tools that enable users to validate customizations prior to production deployments. Using ATF can reduce testing timeframes and eliminates many of the risk variables associated with the upgrade process
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.automated_testing_framework"
		name="Automated Test Framework"
		version="1.0.0"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		state="published"
		type="feature_set"
		trackable="true"
		namespace="sn_atf"
		help="CSHelp:ATF-Automated-Test-Framework">
	<description>Testing framework and tools that enable users to validate customizations prior to production deployments. Using ATF can reduce testing timeframes and eliminates many of the risk variables associated with the upgrade process</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.rollback" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.element_mapping" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.element_mapping_v2" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.vars" />
		<import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng" />
		<import plugin="com.devsnc_library_intent_channel" />
	</requires>


	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AutomatedTestingFramework" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.AutomatedTestingFramework"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ExecuteUserTest" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ExecuteUserTest"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UserTestProcessor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.UserTestProcessor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UserTestSuiteExecutor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.UserTestSuiteExecutor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RerunTestSuiteExecutor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.RerunTestSuiteExecutor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestClaimer" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.TestClaimer"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StepResult" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.StepResult"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestSuiteProcessor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.TestSuiteProcessor"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFTrackerUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFTrackerUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFFormUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFFormUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Step" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.runner.step.script.Step"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StepConfig" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.StepConfig"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFVariableElementMapper" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFVariableElementMapper"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFBrowserCompatibility" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFBrowserCompatibility"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DockerServiceCleanup" class="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.schedule.headless.docker.DockerServiceCleanup"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFBreakpoint" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFBreakpoint"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestGeneratorUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.sn_atf_tg.hosted.TestGeneratorUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFListUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFListUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SchedulerAPI" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.SchedulerAPI"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.update.base_upgrade_handlers" name="ATFBaseUpgradeHandler" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.base_upgraded.ATFBaseUpgradeHandler"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="atf_only" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.ATFOnlyTag"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.authentication.cert" name="MutualAuthATFCertUserResolver" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.MutualAuthATFCertUserResolver"/>
</plugin>

result.description: Install this plugin to enable sensitive data redaction from inbound emails. Post installation, the default behaviour is to redact sensitive data for records created in sys_email (Subject, Body and Body Text fields) table for all the new inbound emails. Once this plugin is installed, the next step is to install the Store App - Data Discovery(com.snc.data_discovery) for this plugin to work seamlessly.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.glide.email_inbound.redaction"
		name="Sensitive Data Redaction for Inbound Emails"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow">
	<description>Install this plugin to enable sensitive data redaction from inbound emails. Post installation, the default behaviour is to redact sensitive data for records created in sys_email (Subject, Body and Body Text fields) table for all the new inbound emails. Once this plugin is installed, the next step is to install the Store App - Data Discovery(com.snc.data_discovery) for this plugin to work seamlessly.</description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.glide.mailbox"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.data_privacy"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Sensitive Data Redaction for Inbound Emails

result.description: It's a framework that enables to fulfill the translation requests received from Localization Framework Spoke.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin 
	version="1.0.4" 
	id="com.sn.localization_framework.hub" 
	name="Localization Framework Hub" 
	licensable="false" 
	scope_name="sn_lf_hub" 
	scope_sys_id="5f989962530321108a8fddeeff7b126d" 
	state="published" 
	provider_name="ServiceNow" 
	type="application">
	
	<description>It's a framework that enables to fulfill the translation requests received from Localization Framework Spoke.</description>
	<requires>

result.description: Create and configure policies to perform actions to drive CI lifecycle events such as deletion and archive, against sets of CIs. For each policy, you can exclude CIs from the policy actions by using an exclusion list. A scheduled job is used to evaluate policies and then execute it against the specified CIs.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
	id="com.snc.cmdb.ci_lifecycle_manager"
	name="CMDB Data Manager"
	version="1.0.0"
	state="published"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	cache_flush="false"
	licensable="false"
	trackable ="true"
	namespace="sn_cmdb_data_manager">
	<description>
	    Create and configure policies to perform actions to drive CI lifecycle events such as deletion and archive, against sets of CIs. For each policy, you can exclude CIs from the policy actions by using an exclusion list. A scheduled job is used to evaluate policies and then execute it against the specified CIs.
        </description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.cmdb"/>
		<import plugin="com.glide.auxdb"/>
    </requires>

	<!-- Data Manager -->
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBDataManagerScriptableApis" class="com.snc.cmdb.data_manager.scriptable.CMDBDataManagerScriptableApis" />
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CMDBDataManagerScopedScriptableApis" class="com.snc.cmdb.data_manager.scriptable.CMDBDataManagerScopedScriptableApis" />

</plugin>
result.name: CMDB Data Manager

	id="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.catalog_builder"
	name="Service Catalog Builder"
	version="1.0.0"
	provider_name="ServiceNow"
	trackable="true"
	state="published">

result.description:
This best practice plugin helps to identify the cause of a service interruption reported by a significant or recurring incidents.
	- Provides roles for problem management including a problem coordinator, problem manager and problem administrator
	- Provides fields to record the category, where the issue was first reported, the workaround, the cause notes and the fix notes
	- Searches for and attaches knowledge articles
	- Communicates when a workaround or fix is available
	- Clears the Assigned to field when changing the Assignment group
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
    id="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid"
    name="Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid"
    version="1.0.0"
    provider_name="ServiceNow"
    state="published"
    help="Problem-Management-Baseline-Madrid"
    licensable="true">
    <description>
This best practice plugin helps to identify the cause of a service interruption reported by a significant or recurring incidents.
	- Provides roles for problem management including a problem coordinator, problem manager and problem administrator
	- Provides fields to record the category, where the issue was first reported, the workaround, the cause notes and the fix notes
	- Searches for and attaches knowledge articles
	- Communicates when a workaround or fix is available
	- Clears the Assigned to field when changing the Assignment group
    </description>
	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.problem"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.problem_task"/>
	</requires>
</plugin>
result.name: Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid

result.description:
Use this plugin to install the Knowledge Management Advanced plugin. When you activate/upgrade this plugin, it will do validations on knowledge articles and knowledge bases to make sure that the Knowledge Management Advanced plugin can be succesfully installed. If validation fails, please look at the errors in the Plugin Activation Logs and follow instructions given to fix them.
   Once all the issues are fixed, please re-run this plugin to install Knowledge Management Advanced.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
   id="com.snc.knowledge_advanced.installer"
   name="Knowledge Management Advanced Installer"
   version="1.0.0"
   after_install_or_upgrade="install_knowledge_advanced.js"
   provider_name="ServiceNow"
   state="published"
   help="CSHelp:Knowledge-Management-Advanced-Installer"
   trackable="true"
   licensable="false">
   <description>
   Use this plugin to install the Knowledge Management Advanced plugin. When you activate/upgrade this plugin, it will do validations on knowledge articles and knowledge bases to make sure that the Knowledge Management Advanced plugin can be succesfully installed. If validation fails, please look at the errors in the Plugin Activation Logs and follow instructions given to fix them.
   Once all the issues are fixed, please re-run this plugin to install Knowledge Management Advanced.</description>
 </plugin>
result.name: Knowledge Management Advanced Installer

result.description:
Updates the Customer Service dashboard and incorporates indicators for the following plugins: Major Issue Management, Customer Service Case Action Status, Customer Service with Request Management, Customer Service with Service Management, Agent Chat, Advanced Work Assignment for CSM, and Performance Analytics Content Pack and Advanced Work Assignment. Activate these plugins in order to view the related indicators. Without these plugins, indicators may not display correctly.

		Activation of the Performance Analytics Content Pack Customer Service Management Advanced plugin on production instances may require a separate performance Analytics license. Contact ServiceNow for details.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin id="com.snc.pa.customer_service_advanced"
	name="Performance Analytics - Content Pack - Customer Service Management - Advanced"
	type="feature_set"
	provider_name="ServiceNow" 
	help="CSHelp:PA-Content-Pack-Customer-Service-Advanced"
	state="published"
	trackable="true"
	licensable="true"
	version="1.0.0">

	<description>Updates the Customer Service dashboard and incorporates indicators for the following plugins: Major Issue Management, Customer Service Case Action Status, Customer Service with Request Management, Customer Service with Service Management, Agent Chat, Advanced Work Assignment for CSM, and Performance Analytics Content Pack and Advanced Work Assignment. Activate these plugins in order to view the related indicators. Without these plugins, indicators may not display correctly.

		Activation of the Performance Analytics Content Pack Customer Service Management Advanced plugin on production instances may require a separate performance Analytics license. Contact ServiceNow for details.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa" />
		<import plugin="com.glideapp.report.customer_service" />
		<import plugin="com.sn_customerservice" />
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa.spotlight" />
	</requires>

</plugin>

result.description: Change Success Score is a numerical expression that represents the change success history for a particular group. Change Model Success is expressed as a percentage and represents the overall success of each change model and change type. Both indicators can be used to evaluate the likelihood of future success and help determine the level of change rigor required.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin
    id="com.snc.change_management.change_success_score"
    name="Change Management - Change Success Score"
    version="1.0.0"
    state="published"
    help="CSHelp:Change-Success-Score"
    provider_name="ServiceNow"
   	licensable="true"
	scope_name="sn_chg_score"
	scope_sys_id="0f3b87c173330010491d235f04f6a7ab">

	<description>Change Success Score is a numerical expression that represents the change success history for a particular group. Change Model Success is expressed as a percentage and represents the overall success of each change model and change type. Both indicators can be used to evaluate the likelihood of future success and help determine the level of change rigor required.</description>

	<requires>
		<import plugin="com.snc.change_request"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.pa"/>
		<import plugin="com.snc.change_management.change_success_score.foundation"/>
	</requires>
 </plugin>
result.name: Change Management - Change Success Score

result.description: This plugin enables security administrators to define security policies that require step-up authentication or re-authentication within a logged-in session, based on the data the user is accessing and the activities they are performing.
result.definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<plugin id="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication"
		name="Zero Trust - Continuous Authentication"
		version="1.0.0"
		state="published"
		provider_name="ServiceNow"
		trackable="true"
		licensable="true"
		license_model="app_use"
		namespace="sn_zta">
	<description>
		This plugin enables security administrators to define security policies that require step-up authentication or re-authentication within a logged-in session, based on the data the user is accessing and the activities they are performing.
	</description>

	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ContinuousAuthenticationSAMLUtil" class="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication.saml.ContinuousAuthenticationSAMLUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ContinuousAuthenticationMfaUtil" class="com.glide.sys.authenticate.ContinuousAuthenticationMfaUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HighAssuranceUtil" class="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication.HighAssuranceUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ContinuousAuthenticationUtil" class="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication.ScopedContinuousAuthenticationUtil"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ContinuousAuthLogClient" class="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication.audit.ScriptableContinuousAuthLogClient"/>
	<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="ContinuousAuthenticationACLChangeListener" class="com.snc.zero_trust_continuous_authentication.ContinuousAuthenticationACLChangeListener"/>
</plugin>
result.name: Zero Trust - Continuous Authentication
